story:
Little Grim Entertainment is an animation studio founded by Jeff Giron and based out of Dallas, TX.

Some people have the perception that animation is either only for kids, or adult comedies like South Park, Family Guy, Rick and Morty, etc. There’s really not a lot of content that would fit in the middle, at least not in the U.S. Our perspective is that animation is simply a tool to tell a great story, something that countries like Japan have really adapted to and made up to be an incredibly lucrative industry. With streaming networks like Netflix, Amazon, and Hulu embracing anime, and its general popularity in the US, we believe we’re starting to see a public outcry for action/adventure animation with more adult themes.

In short our mission as a company, is to start exploring that middle ground and to develop animated shows that have the heart, humor, and strong character development of others like Avatar: The Last Airbender, Voltron, and Niko and the Sword of Light; but also aren’t afraid to dive into more themes.

 

 

Lost King is our first animated series that follows two modern-day brothers, Donny and Kyle King, who are lost in a nerdy fantasy world where all the common stereotypes from Video Games, Sci-Fi, Comic Books, Anime, are now a reality.

 

 

 

Donny and Kyle had a very difficult childhood. They grew up with an abusive father who would often come home drunk and take his frustrations out on the nearest family member. One day, their father attempts to rob a bank. During his escape, he ends up shooting and killing a woman. He is caught and sentenced to life in prison.

Living in a small town, word got around and their family became the pariahs of the town with most people assuming the brothers would grow up to be just like their father. They grew up and dealt with this in very different ways.

 

 

Kyle quickly grew to become the responsible one. He has always felt the need to look after his little brother. Keeping himself in peak physical shape, Kyle is determined to never feel helpless again and ensure he can protect the people he cares for. As a result, he has become a talented athlete. Which has unintentionally helped him escape his family’s dark image. Now 18, and a senior, Kyle is the star QB for their high school football team. And although he doesn’t aim to be so, he is extremely popular. Despite his new found popularity, Kyle remains very humble. Because of his past, he was forced to grow and mature very quickly. Getting good grades, going to college, and making something of himself is his goal.

 

Donny is now 16 and a sophomore in the same high school as Kyle. He took more of an escapist rout. To him, Comic books, anime, video games, and other forms of entertainment were his way to escape the reality he lived in. As a result, his personality mirrors a lot of traits he’s picked up online, be it multiplayer gaming or general internet personas. Like most kids who play online games, he can be obnoxious and vulgar. However, In Donny’s case, he doesn’t know how to separate that from his behavior in public. Because of this, he doesn’t make many real world friends. Which is fine with him, as he prefers the digital ones.

 

 

The show begins with Donny skipping school visiting his favorite comic book shop. As he’s browsing around, he sees the store clerk opening up a shipment that has just come in. The clerk pulls out a very extravagant looking amulet that draws Donny’s attention. The clerk explains to Donny that the amulet is a prop for a role playing game, however he was about to ship it back as a misprint because, aside from the world description, most of the pages in the book are blank. The clerk notices Donny is still enamored by the amulet, so he offers to sell it to him half off. Donny agrees and places the amulet in his backpack.

Donny then meets Kyle at school and begins to walk home with him. On their way home they run into a group of boys about their age. It becomes clear one of the boys has it out for the brothers and it is quickly revealed that he is the son  of the woman their father killed. Naturally, this boy has it out for the brothers and their family. Kyle tries to do the right thing and move on, ignoring the boy’s threats. However Donny, being Donny, starts instigating and insulting the boy. Finally the boys grab Donny and throw him to the ground, forcing Kyle to step in and defend his younger brother. Kyle is able to hold his own for a bit, being bigger and stronger than the other kids. However, eventually he is overwhelmed and brought to the ground. Donny looks up from the ground and sees his brother getting beaten. Suddenly flashbacks of their father go through his mind and he finds himself wishing he was someplace else. A world that made sense to him, one where the little guy has a chance to become something great. The next thing they know, Kyle and Donny wake up in a new world...

 

The world the brothers find themselves in is like something straight out of the imagination of the ultimate nerd. As they adventure through this mysterious place, they encounter a variety of characters and creatures from different media. Sci-fi cyborgs to high fantasy elves, anime girls to comic book superheroes, this world seems to have it all. It even abides by different rules and mechanics that exist in these various media.

Hitomi represents the typical anime warrior woman. She’s a beautiful, busty, skilled fighter who barely wears anything and calls it “armor”. Most of the Magic in this world consists of spells that are cast by people like Donny. However, there are a few special people in the world who have elements within themselves. While their powers are strong than standard magic users, they are unable to cast their abilities the way a mage would. However, a special metal was discovered that draws out these people’s inner abilities. Since its discovery, specialized blacksmiths have forged weapons for these people out of the metal that allow them to effectively control and wield their powers.

Hitomi is one of these special people, however she is even more rare as she contains two elements inside of her. Both fire and ice. The dual blades she wields are identical, but depending on which side of her body she holds the metal determines which element it draws out.

Hitomi is the former queen and ruler of this fantasy world. She can be full of herself and cocky, but for good reason. Because of her elemental abilities, she is one of the strongest warriors in this world. Every year she hosts a tournament attempting to find someone who can best her in battle. What began with gold for a prize was increased year after year. No matter how great of a prize she offered, nobody was able to defeat her. Finally, she offered up the ultimate prize, her kingdom. During this tournament a mysterious man challenged Hitomi. His name is Lord Maltac...

Not much is known about this mysterious person. The aura that surrounds him has the ability to form a defensive barrier. It can also be solidified and propelled from his body and used offensively to attack or snare his targets. Finally, Maltac has the ability to disintegrate anything his hands touch, making him a fierce and deadly foe. To everyone’s surprise, Hitomi is no match for Lord Maltac, and he easily defeats her. In one last desperate attack, Hitomi lunges at Maltac with one of her blades. He grabs a hold of it and it dissolves into dust. At the moment, Hitomi falls to her knees and admits defeat. She is cast out of her own kingdom and wanders the world.

 

Composer Carlos Rodríguez Rodríguez has created a wonderful soundtrack for the series. A few of the pieces, including the main theme, can be heard bellow.

 

 

 

The amount we're asking for is to allow us to finish animating this trailer. As mentioned in the video, due to struggles with the COVID-19 crisis, we have been unable to finish animating this trailer. This trailer will allow us to pitch to various networks like Netflix, Hulu, etc.

 

 

 

 

 

The world is in chaos right now, we understand it is difficult for people to financially support something like this. We are simply at a point where we need assistance in order to finish this trailer. There's also no guarantee that even with this trailer complete, that we'll be picked up by a network. Since this is an animated show that's not an adult comedy or aimed at children, many U.S. studios won't consider it a lucrative investment. However, we believe that people are ready for more dramatic action animation that isn't just for children.

 

If you aren't in a position where you can donate, please share the campaign around on Facebook, Twitter, and other social media outlets! The more we can spread the news of Lost Kings, the more likely we'll make our funding.

story:
A New Vision Created by:

 

Zebediah De Soto

Producer,Director,Writer

 

STARRING

BILL MOSELEY (Devil's rejects fame)

GLEN POWELL (Scream queens fame)

TINY LISTER (The Dark Knight fame)

SEAN STONE (Conspiracy Theory, JFK fame)

KRISTAL MARIE DE SOTO (Model and Altered Spirits fame)

TOM SIZEMORE (Heat, Saving Private Ryan, Lucifer fame)

BILL  OBERST JR (The Devil Within fame)

ROSANNA DE SOTO (Star Trek fame)

DAVID LOCKHART (The Chronicles of the Order: Bloodline  fame)

 

Grimm's Fairy Tales were a collection of 209 works released in the early 19th century that to this day thrill readers with their bleak and twisted themes.  Grimm's War is a dark modern day retelling of Grimm’s Classic fairy tales, focused around a fictional War set in a post apocalyptic future.

Each character in this war personifies a specific fairy tale from the Grimm's stories, with the character's reality weaving in and out of two realities.

Our first reality is an ugly futuristic war set against the backdrop of a nuclear winter, while our second reality is a pure fantasy world, set against the dark and macabre backdrop of Grimm’s Fairy Tales.

In the past, we have created some really incredible projects with such visionaries as Producer Simon West (of “Expendables 2” and Con Air fame) Night of the living Dead: Darkest Dawn. 

Award Winning Documentaries such as His Name Was Jason: 30 Years of Friday the 13th, produced by Anthony Masi.

Television projects “Starz: Martin Lawrence First Amendment Comedy Act” and  “Dread Central Live”

Even commercials with legendary Ridley Scott & Associates: TAPOUT. Los Angeles Biggest Horror festival “Screamfest”, “Monsters HD”, “Boostmobile” etc…

But this time we need your help to make something completely INDEPENDENT!  We’ve worked in the Hollywood system for long enough and now we want to truly CREATE! No rules, no restrictions, just pure Sci-Fi / Horror AWESOMNESS! Funds from Indiegogo will be used for:

  • Bad Ass visual Effects!  Judging by the trailer, you can pretty much see the effects we pull off so far are AMAZING! But we want to take our web series and game to the next level!

 

  • There are 209 fairy tales collected by the brothers Grimm that we are telling!

 

  • Grimm’s War, the game!

 

  • An Oculus rift friendly Game and Webisode!

 

  • Talent! Talent! Talent! During our careers we’ve had the opportunity to work with some pretty amazing and talented actors, especially the horror greats!

 

Tony Todd (of “Candyman” and "The Crow" fame), Bill Moseley (of “Rob Zombies The Devil's Rejects” fame), Danielle Harris (of “Rob Zombie's Halloween" fame), Alona Tal (of "Mark Wahlberg’s Broken City" and "Burn Notice" fame), Glen Powell (of “The Dark Knight Rises” and “Expendables 3” fame), Tom Sizemore (of “Heat” and "Lucifer” fame etc...)  

 

  • The more money we can raise, the more AMAZING actors we can bring on board!

 

  • Episodes! This is Season 1. We are doing four 10 minute episodes this season. The more money we raise the more episodes we can produce!!!!

Here's a breakdown of the budget:

 

So maybe you’ve backed a couple crowd funding projects before which went the way of the Dodo bird, as they were here one second and gone the next. So how are we different?

We’ve ALREADY started the project! Check out the Trailer! Awesome right?

  • This is not our first rodeo cowboys and cowgirls! We have worked with the biggest and the best that Hollywood has to offer.

 

  • We have the team with the talent! For over a decade we’ve been honing our skills in this industry building a reputation not to be reckoned with!

 

  • We are, right now, building the biggest productions the internet has ever seen and all we need now is you to be a part of our next big leap into the future!

Once the campaign starts, we will begin behind the scenes perks right away. Here's a list of planned events during the campaign:

  • Tuesday, October 16th, 2018 -- First Supporter update goes out.
  • Tuesday October 23rd, 2018 -- Conference call for all early BTS and up supporters in which we announce the two stories selected by our biggest investors. 
  • Tuesday November 6, 2018 – We announce newest cast members of Grimm’s War
  • Tuesday November 20, 2018 – New Stretch goals are announced!

 

We are super excited about our project, and even more excited about the fact that our supporters were able to make such generous contributions! So in return, we’ve come up with some pretty awesome “Thank You” Swag!

 

Over $1,000,000

At this milestone, we will go into production on a full on feature film !

$100,000 Season 2!

By hitting this goal, we will produce four (4) new episodes of our new hit series in 4k format and the amazing Oculus Rift and mobile VR friendly format!

$50,000 Season 1 budget Goal reached featuring a Special Oculus Rift/mobile VR friendly episode!

By making this goal, we are producing four (4) episodes, Episode 1 to be our first Oculus Rift/mobile VR Friendly show of the web’s newest hit series Grimm’s War!
story_txt:
A New Vision Created by: Zebediah De SotoProducer,Director,Writer STARRINGBILL MOSELEY (Devil's rejects fame)GLEN POWELL (Scream queens fame)TINY LISTER (The Dark Knight fame)SEAN STONE (Conspiracy Theory, JFK fame)KRISTAL MARIE DE SOTO (Model and Altered Spirits fame)TOM SIZEMORE (Heat, Saving Private Ryan, Lucifer fame)BILL  OBERST JR (The Devil Within fame)ROSANNA DE SOTO (Star Trek fame)DAVID LOCKHART (The Chronicles of the Order: Bloodline  fame) Grimm's Fairy Tales were a collection of 209 works released in the early 19th century that to this day thrill readers with their bleak and twisted themes.  Grimm's War is a dark modern day retelling of Grimm’s Classic fairy tales, focused around a fictional War set in a post apocalyptic future.Each character in this war personifies a specific fairy tale from the Grimm's stories, with the character's reality weaving in and out of two realities.Our first reality is an ugly futuristic war set against the backdrop of a nuclear winter, while our second reality is a pure fantasy world, set against the dark and macabre backdrop of Grimm’s Fairy Tales.In the past, we have created some really incredible projects with such visionaries as Producer Simon West (of “Expendables 2” and Con Air fame) Night of the living Dead: Darkest Dawn. Award Winning Documentaries such as His Name Was Jason: 30 Years of Friday the 13th, produced by Anthony Masi.Television projects “Starz: Martin Lawrence First Amendment Comedy Act” and  “Dread Central Live”Even commercials with legendary Ridley Scott & Associates: TAPOUT. Los Angeles Biggest Horror festival “Screamfest”, “Monsters HD”, “Boostmobile” etc…But this time we need your help to make something completely INDEPENDENT!  We’ve worked in the Hollywood system for long enough and now we want to truly CREATE! No rules, no restrictions, just pure Sci-Fi / Horror AWESOMNESS! Funds from Indiegogo will be used for:Bad Ass visual Effects!  Judging by the trailer, you can pretty much see the effects we pull off so far are AMAZING! But we want to take our web series and game to the next level! There are 209 fairy tales collected by the brothers Grimm that we are telling! Grimm’s War, the game! An Oculus rift friendly Game and Webisode! Talent! Talent! Talent! During our careers we’ve had the opportunity to work with some pretty amazing and talented actors, especially the horror greats! Tony Todd (of “Candyman” and "The Crow" fame), Bill Moseley (of “Rob Zombies The Devil's Rejects” fame), Danielle Harris (of “Rob Zombie's Halloween" fame), Alona Tal (of "Mark Wahlberg’s Broken City" and "Burn Notice" fame), Glen Powell (of “The Dark Knight Rises” and “Expendables 3” fame), Tom Sizemore (of “Heat” and "Lucifer” fame etc...)   The more money we can raise, the more AMAZING actors we can bring on board! Episodes! This is Season 1. We are doing four 10 minute episodes this season. The more money we raise the more episodes we can produce!!!!Here's a breakdown of the budget: So maybe you’ve backed a couple crowd funding projects before which went the way of the Dodo bird, as they were here one second and gone the next. So how are we different?We’ve ALREADY started the project! Check out the Trailer! Awesome right?This is not our first rodeo cowboys and cowgirls! We have worked with the biggest and the best that Hollywood has to offer. We have the team with the talent! For over a decade we’ve been honing our skills in this industry building a reputation not to be reckoned with! We are, right now, building the biggest productions the internet has ever seen and all we need now is you to be a part of our next big leap into the future!Once the campaign starts, we will begin behind the scenes perks right away. Here's a list of planned events during the campaign:

Tuesday, October 16th, 2018 -- First Supporter update goes out.

Tuesday October 23rd, 2018 -- Conference call for all early BTS and up supporters in which we announce the two stories selected by our biggest investors. 

Tuesday November 6, 2018 – We announce newest cast members of Grimm’s War

Tuesday November 20, 2018 – New Stretch goals are announced!
 We are super excited about our project, and even more excited about the fact that our supporters were able to make such generous contributions! So in return, we’ve come up with some pretty awesome “Thank You” Swag! Over $1,000,000At this milestone, we will go into production on a full on feature film !$100,000 Season 2!By hitting this goal, we will produce four (4) new episodes of our new hit series in 4k format and the amazing Oculus Rift and mobile VR friendly format!$50,000 Season 1 budget Goal reached featuring a Special Oculus Rift/mobile VR friendly episode!By making this goal, we are producing four (4) episodes, Episode 1 to be our first Oculus Rift/mobile VR Friendly show of the web’s newest hit series Grimm’s War!

story:
After watching a lot of TV in my early to mid teens, my mind began thinking of ideas for my own show or film and evntually I came up with the idea for 'Sincerely Floyd', so when I ended up studying film and media 2 years later and began learning the skills I needed to make it, I thought 'Why not?' and just set about making it.

I began pulling together a few friends I knew could help on the technical side, the I moved onto finding actors which lead me to reconnect with a few old school friends. After a few months of getting a crew, I began writing scripts and before I knew it, I had a whole cast and a crew ready to start production. 

Unfortunately, I underestimated the cost of a production this ambitious, for a person of my age. I sunk around £200 into the first 2 episodes, forking out for props, costumes, travel and bits of equipment. Along with the help of my older brother who put in a bit of money and was then brought in as an executive producer, I was able to push through the trouble and get episodes 1 and 2 produced and released.

So this is the reason I took to Indiegogo. I need money to help fund the next 4 episodes because I and my team have a passion for this project and don't want this great potential go to waste. With a higher budget, I can get more people on board and starting buying more things for each episode.

If you are unable to donate, then please share and pass this on to as many people as you can, so that we can reach as much of our goal as possible. All the money will go towards necessary parts for the production.

story:
We are fortunate enough to have secured a wonderful cast and crew to bring this light hearted drama to you, however, we now need to raise the funds to ensure we do justice to the new series of Randall & Hopkirk.

'Randall & Hopkirk (Revisited)' is a sequel which plays complete homage to the original 1960's production. The pilot introduces Rebecca Randall who takes on the detective agency in the wake of her father's murder and together with her ghostly "uncle" Marty Hopkirk (Kenneth Cope), she sets out to uncover the plot behind her father's murder and bring the perpetrators to justice.

 

Why we are asking for your help:

'Randall & Hopkirk' is a sequel of the original 1960's British Classic of the detective agency in the present day. 

We are looking to raise a minimum£3000 to complete the pilot. This money will be used for:

Camera Hire - We need a good quality film camera suitable for TV commision

Sound - Good quality sound equipment

Post Production

Insurance - Legal requirement for most locations and all shoots.

We have a wide range of perks, so there will be something for everyone. 
 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can donate anything no matter how small we would be very grateful. We understand people may not be in a position to help financially, however, you can still help us by posting our campaign on social media sites and sharing wherever you can - thank you!

story:
ONION SOUP SERIES

"Hi, I'm teau (tōe) Johnson.  Singer, songwriter, film editor and educator that's passionate about releasing quality art with limited resources.  I am looking to raise $2800 for an online series I'm working on called "Onion Soup.” Onion Soup is one of the many small projects that I've created meant to bridge music, film, art and fashion, impacting people in a profound way. I’ve assembled the gear necessary to film but now I need the resources to pay some of the actors, the locations and the crew necessary to make this series a success. And just a note: The crew is super special to me because I would be using some of the students I educate that have an interest in filmmaking. To do this, I will need your help. And to make this worthwhile, I am offering a couple of perks just for you!

• Actors: (I have asked many people to donate their time but) I would like to offer a token of appreciation to our actors that are dedicated to the process. • Feeding the cast and crew; I want to keep everyone working on this project fed and happy!

• Locations and Production Design: I am filming in two locations, which I will need to hire. I will also need to dedicate money to dressing the locations to make them believable as well as purchase a few pieces for wardrobe etc.

• • Perks: Any contributions $50 or more gets featured in the Credits & has access to exclusive footage. $450 or more get's "Associate Producer Credit:" You helped make this series/film possible, and for that, you get to be notarized for it. You'll get IMDB credit, film credit, and poster credit as our AP---you're a part of the team.

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Special Shout Out To::::::::::

Patricia Bendsen (Credit Feature) 

Amiri Maxwell-Allen

Erika Svolos

"Anonymous" 

For Your Contribution::::::::::

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

If you are unable to contribute at this time, PLEASE share the link or post, so that the Onion Soup Series can continue to get the word out. And hashtag or @ OnionSoupSeries on instagram and 4teau7 on YouTube.

Grassroots: "If you look at a blade of grass, it appears to be fairly unremarkable. It is fragile, easily broken. On its own, it is weak. If you have ever tried to dig up a bunch of grass, however, you know that grass’ roots are incredibly strong. The roots use each other for strength and perseverance. Singly, grass is ineffective; in large numbers, grass is powerful, even invasive. This is the idea behind a grassroots campaign. In large numbers, even individuals can affect great change." ...I would love your support!

story:
About us?

My name is Mauro Muyano and I am a Digital Animation Technician.
All my life I work in the field of animation and graphic arts.
I was a designer, video editor, animator, participated in tv shows, commercials, animated series and videogames.
I always dream of creating my own animation studio and producing my own animated movies and series. I have several projects started, waiting for some of my free time that never comes.
Rústico & Netico is one of them.
But I'm not alone in this project:
The original idea of ​​serie is shared with Carlos Javier Flores. A musician and composer with whom we devised these characters.
Together we complement each other very well, he is a profecional of the sound and I of the image.
He is in charge of the music, voices, sound effects and I'm in charge of the design of characters, scenarios, script and animation.
But despite being able to cover all areas, we are only two people. We're going to need some help. With your collaboration, you will not only be helping to produce this serie.
You will be helping us start with our own animation studio.

the animated series

is a series mainly of humor that is based on the differences between the two protagonists of totally opposite characteristics. In addition to the humor the series also leaves some lessons especially of moral type, since in spite of their differences, they always manage to solve their problems. Their differences instead of separating them complement them.
The series is about friendship, coexistence, tolerance, respect, humility and much laughter.

He is a primitive being from another world.
He is messy, dirty, rough, clumsy, careless, impulsive, immature, childish, innocent, restless.
He has great physical abilities but little brain. He is very sentimental and expressive. He almost never speaks and when he does he uses the least possible number of words and always speaks of himself in the third person. Despite this he is very social and friendly he likes sports and outdoor activities. He does not need many things to be happy, he finds pleasure in the simplest things in life: a good company, a sunset, a delicious meal. He likes animals and he understands them very well. He is very skilled at working with his hands and enjoys doing all kinds of crafts. He likes healthy and natural food like fruits and vegetables, does not like electronic music or very noisy music. he prefers instrumental music without synthesizers or electric instruments.
He does not like or understand technology such as cell phones or game consoles and breaks everything he touches.

He comes from a world much more advanced than ours.
He is methodical, neat, tidy, clean, calm, careful, witty, planner and intellectual
He is very intelligent and intuitively understands any device that falls into his hands. Intellectually he is very active, he likes to read, research and learn new things. He is interested in all sciences in physics, chemistry, biology, history, paleontology ... etc. he can spend hours sitting in front of a computer, TV, cell phone or tablet. It takes a lot of work to overcome laziness to perform some physical activity or simply leave Her home.
Her body is small weak slow and fragile. He does not like sports and is not very sociable. He needs to be surrounded by devices to be happy. You get bored if you do not have a tablet, computer, video game console, TV or at least a radio or cell phone on hand. He does not get along with the animals, the big ones are afraid of them and the small ones like frogs or insects make him disgust.
He likes techno, rok or pop music. Play electric guitar
in terms of food, he eats very little and prefers processed and fatty foods such as snaks, chips, candies and chocolates

What we need and what you get

Animation is very expensive. Producing a few seconds of animation can take weeks of work for the animator. It is for this reason that the animation studios are integrated by a large number of animators.
To be able to do this same work but with a team of only 3 members we will have to work many more hours than we would work if we worked in a large animation studio. Each one of us will have to cover many areas of work.
This allows us to reduce costs but not eliminate them.

Our costs:

An animated video of between a minute or a minute and a half (with music and voice-over) has a minimum cost of around 400 or 500 dollars. and it takes between 1 and two weeks to produce it. Following this reasoning, the series consists of 10 chapters of 5 minutes that are 50 minutes of animation so its cost would be around 16,000 dollars and its production time would be around the year.

The rewards

As argadesimiento for your help we have different types of rewards that range from a simple mail of agradesimiento to the complete series (all chapters) plus wallappers art book in PDF, his name in the credits, and the music of the series.
All rewards will be in digital format to avoid problems with shipping

What happens if we do not arrive?

In the case of not reaching the goal of $ 16,000, the funds raised will be used in the series anyway. Maybe it will take us longer or maybe we will do the first season with fewer chapters. But in one way or another the series will end, the rewards will be delivered and the series will be published probably in Amazon Video

 

Risks and challenges:

An animated cerie of these characteristics is always a challenge
and more for a team as small as ours
but we still have a lot of confidence in our work. It is not the first time I work on a project like this nor will it be the last. We are few but we cover  all the necessary specialties to do the work. Script, illustration, design, animation, editing, musical composition, locution, etc. We just need the time necessary to do the work. And that is what they are giving us with their contribution.
From already thank you very much

story:
The Story 

Russell meets Xandra and their lives are changed. Of course, that's how it always goes, right? This journey goes through phases and steps for the young couple, including moments of laughter and times of conflict. Were they better off before they were together? Feel the highs and uncomfortable lows in this series about love and ambition in the 21st century.  

My Story 

Since my early teens I've had a great interest in film. At that age I took my camcorder with me wherever I could. I made and edited my own one-man short films. Now, I'm prepared to share my storytelling with the world. My central mission is to make great independent content that empowers all involved. "8 Steps" was birthed from my desire to bring something great to the table, something more personal and impactful than what I was used to seeing all over social media. I want to not only contribute to the culture, but shift and elevate it. 

-Flen

Your Support

Supporters will help with an inaugural project for 27 Mastermind Productions. We look to put the perfect pieces in place to create a phenomenal experience for viewers, from cinematography to a superb soundtrack. Culture, emotion, and relatability are all in store. 

We are in pre-production so funding will help with equipment, transportation, music production, promotional material, audio, and video editing. 

We appreciate every contribution, and if you are unable to contribute, you can still help by sharing this campaign.

story:
I’d like to interest you in an exciting opportunity to invest in the season 1 of ten90 a new web series for Tatum Studios. I’m Barbara Tatum, CEO, and you’re probably wondering, “Why is it called ten90?” Well, “Life is 10% of what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.”

Light and Dark Comedy, Drama, Suspense…love, envy, sex…“ten90” has it all! Concentrating on the 21-40 female demographic, the show follows the lives of four female friends, living, growing, falling, and coming together, in the heart of Atlanta. The entire season will have a continuing story arc, with serial plot(s) that will keep the viewer tuning in and coming back for more…every single week.

Tatum Studios is looking to raise $12,000 to fund the production of this season 1, which will then be pitched to big names in the entertainment industry like Netflix, Hulu, the CW Network, Showtime, and more. The investment will be needed by or the before the end of May, 2018, and I hope that you can be a part of this.

However, it takes a lot to make a web series. We are using a Top-notch, Professional, crew for ten90. Onyx Keesha will be Directing, and Producer(s) - this is going to be an awesome Production! Everything from Lighting and Set Production, to Audio and Editing, will all be done by the best of the up and coming in Atlanta (& Columbus Georgia). When we hit the $12,000 Goal – we will be able to rent:

This donations is necessary for items.

Production Crew

Locations

Craft Services – Coolers

Equipment Rental

Photo Shoot

Voice Over/ Music Production

Hair and makeup

Film Editing

Color Correcting

Scoring

Photo Editing

Graphic Design (Marketing Materiel)

Tents

Walkie -Talkies

Audio Engineer and Audio set-up

web series are definitely hard to sell! Our goal is to make “ten90” awesome...Your Donations are going to go to making all of this happen.

Please Donate and become part of the Team, today! Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.

Thank you so much,

The “ten90” Team @ "Tatum Studios"
story_txt:
I’d like to interest you in an exciting opportunity to invest in the season 1 of ten90 a new web series for Tatum Studios. I’m Barbara Tatum, CEO, and you’re probably wondering, “Why is it called ten90?” Well, “Life is 10% of what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.”

Light and Dark Comedy, Drama, Suspense…love, envy, sex…“ten90” has it all! Concentrating on the 21-40 female demographic, the show follows the lives of four female friends, living, growing, falling, and coming together, in the heart of Atlanta. The entire season will have a continuing story arc, with serial plot(s) that will keep the viewer tuning in and coming back for more…every single week.

Tatum Studios is looking to raise $12,000 to fund the production of this season 1, which will then be pitched to big names in the entertainment industry like Netflix, Hulu, the CW Network, Showtime, and more. The investment will be needed by or the before the end of May, 2018, and I hope that you can be a part of this.
However, it takes a lot to make a web series. We are using a Top-notch, Professional, crew for ten90. Onyx Keesha will be Directing, and Producer(s) - this is going to be an awesome Production! Everything from Lighting and Set Production, to Audio and Editing, will all be done by the best of the up and coming in Atlanta (& Columbus Georgia). When we hit the $12,000 Goal – we will be able to rent:
This donations is necessary for items.
Production Crew
Locations
Craft Services – Coolers
Equipment Rental
Photo Shoot
Voice Over/ Music Production
Hair and makeup
Film Editing
Color Correcting
Scoring
Photo Editing
Graphic Design (Marketing Materiel)
Tents
Walkie -Talkies
Audio Engineer and Audio set-up

web series are definitely hard to sell! Our goal is to make “ten90” awesome...Your Donations are going to go to making all of this happen.
Please Donate and become part of the Team, today! Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
Thank you so much,
The “ten90” Team @ "Tatum Studios"

story:
Detouring with James Shaw follows our presenter, James, as he travels off the beaten path to obscure, mysterious and dangerous locations. We want to create a raw documentary series which takes you with us to some of the strangest places around the world.

We found ourselves uncovering a hidden medical centre underneath Sheffield in Episode 1. In Episode 2, we want to investigate the mystery of Rendlesham Forest - where there was a series of reported sightings of unexplained lights in December 1980. That’s the brilliant thing about Detouring - no two episodes would be the same. That’s why we’re so invested in the concept, and that’s why we’re aiming to produce more episodes after Episode 2. Additionally, we're hoping to get the series commissioned in the future.

For £5, you’ll receive a special ‘thank you’ email. For £10, you’ll be able to watch Episode 2 once it is finished. For £20, you’ll have access to both episodes of Detouring with James Shaw. Finally, for £50, you’ll be able to get all of this, and your name in the credits of Episode 2.

story:
Short Summary

Oliver and Celestine Burn a Witch is an exciting new project from Pensacola based filmmaker Cody Graffius and writer/actor Mitch Wisniewski. This duo has previously worked together on The Finale Girls, an upcoming horror-comedy web series pilot so they are no strangers to making light of the macabre. As lovers of all things funny, creepy, and supernatural Cody and Mitch are launching this campaign to fund a TV pilot that could potentially become your new favorite show.​

Who We Are

Mitch Wisniewski - Creator, Writer, and Lead Actor

Mitch Wisniewski is a writer and actor currently based in Pensacola and soon bound for Los Angeles. He has previously created and written the pilot for The Finale Girls which he also directed. He also has his own podcast Broadway Beat, about all things musical theatre. You can find Mitch on Instagram and Twitter @mitchwis.

Cody Graffius - Director, Executive Producer

Cody Graffius is a Director and Cinematographer located in Pensacola Florida. He has previously collaborated with Mitch as the director of photography on Finale Girls. Coming out of an internship with local production house Vivid Bridge Studios, Cody is ready to return to another TV Pilot and get back to work in the narrative realm. You can find him at @caped_cod on Instagram.

 

The Gist

When Warlock Oliver Blackburn's soul is stolen from his body and placed in the body of a dark warlock named Alastair Mulcahy, he turns to Celestine, Alastair's betrayed magical partner, and a group of her fellow witches in order to track down Alastair and return each warlock to his respective body so Alastair can pay for his crimes.

What We Need & What You Get

So here's what we need to make this happen:

  • A budget of $12,000 that would finance the locations, props, costumes, cast, crew, and equipment we need to make this a truly spectacular show. We are big believers in supporting local talent and creatives and this budget would serve to make sure we're able to pay people what they deserve for working hard to create an incredibly unique and original new pilot. 
  • So what do you get, aside from the satisfaction of knowing you helped budding creatives make their dreams come true? Well, a lot of cool stuff actually. 
  • Perks include access to a directors log podcast, posters, signed scripts, opportunity to be an extra, and a whole lot of other super exciting stuff!
  • We're making this pilot one way or another. If we don't reach our goal the project will still be produced and you'll have an incredibly funny and cool TV pilot to enjoy. 

Your Impact

To be real, making TV is very expensive. By donating to our campaign you're not only ensuring that we make the highest quality pilot but also that the hard work of the cast and crew does not go unappreciated. We want to be sure to bay pay everyone what they deserve to support and give back to local talent. Your contribution allows this to be possible.

story:
Unstable follows the life of an Afro-Latina who decides to pursue her dreams in Hollywood. Soon she finds that it's not as easy as she thought, as she deals with heartbreak, homelessness, and trying to fit in she follows along on the journey of life.

Our goal is to empower Afro Latinos to embrace their heritage and transform the image of the Latinos in the media, while also showing all people how to love themselves and trust the journey.

Our main character Dashay Jocelyn is a Dominican cutie from Yonkers, New York, who is destined for television. Her quirky personality, Latina flair and beautiful melanin is a combination that came to slay.

She spends her days working as a server, and her spare moments dreaming. Finding a balance between doing what she loves (acting/creating), and living sustainably. 

We're telling a story of growth. Taking situations that seem unfortunate and finding light no matter what. We're so excited to share our truths with you and give you some giggles! 
 

What We Need & What You Get

We've set our goal at $20,000, but of course every contribution matters! This money is going to be used in many spectacular ways.

We'll be using the funds raised for locations, COVID tests, production design, equipment, wardrobe, transport and of course to pay and feed our awesome cast and crew!

We have also added some awesome perks to bribe you all and thank you for helping us create this story.

 

The Impact

Unstable is my baby. It's crawling and ready to start walking, and eventually one day running. With your help we will be able to achieve this. You have no idea how much your contribution means to me, and the impact it will have on my journey as a storyteller. It will be forever appreciated! We hope you will join us and be part of helping this beautiful project grow. You never know how strong you are until you need to be!

 

Risks & Challenges

As this is based on our personal journey navigating "The City Of Angels," The most important thing is keeping this honest, authentic, and fun! The story itself is powerful, encouraging and hilarious. I have no doubt we can help change the world if we take our time, have patience, and always do our best!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please follow our process on our Instagram page @unstableofficial

Share us, talk about it, and help us make it great!

Thank you again for your time, and I hope we can make some really awesome things come to fruition together =)

story:
Tucked away in a cold little spot is a town called Duskbowl...

 

Duskbowl is a gripping horror series on Youtube, Spotify, Itunes, and many other sites.

 

Not just a series about monsters and murders; Duskbowl and its planned second and third seasons is a story about grief that uses the horror genre  as a backdrop.

 

As a blind person, I hope to make Duskbowl an easily accessible  audio based series that anyone can love as much as I do.

 

How Can You Help?

So how can you help? Relatively  speaking, Duskbowl is inexpensive  compared to  other projects. But, as someone who is not particularly  "well-off", the cost of the series is  too difficult for me alone.

 

All I need is enough funds to hire the series lead voice actor for another season. Roughly $650 AUD. 

 

I do everything else ( editing, writing etc) myself, and smaller  roles throughout the series I can pay for mysrlf. And this is exactly  how Season 1 was made.

 

Do You Get Rewards?

So what perks do you get for your support? Aside from helping to bring Duskbowl to  life, you will get a high quality one of a kind signed poster, and a special dedication at the start of Season 2.

 

What if We Don't Raise Enough?

Well, what if we don't  reach our raising  goal? All money raised will go into Season 2, and I will hire the voice actor for as much as I can and then narrate  the rest of the series myself.

 

What if We Raise More Than Enough?

If we go over? Excess funds will go towards production  for Season 3, merch, and adapting Duskbowl into a novel.

story:
Who and What: 

My name is K A Cortland Haaf. I am a budding actor and a lifelong storyteller. 

This story is about a man who befriends and hosts an unconventional oracle. He resists his own personal legend until circumstances force him to change. In his quest to end the evils of the world, he discovers an unexpected foe. 

We have provided a Prelude (above) to give the look and feel of the art, the characters, and the storytelling style. 

Where's the money going?! 

  • %40 of your contribution will be divided among the artists to encourage them to continue their hardwork and dedication. Monetary motivation will go a long way to demonstrating your appreciation for their work and galvanizing their morale toward further production! 
  • 10% will go to the actors. Their workload is significantly less than that of the artists, but they still deserve pay! 
  • %5 of your contribution will go to the underground musicians who so graciously rendered their work with the expectation of nothing but "exposure"! 
  • The remainder will go to business expenses: upgrading equipment and software, taxes, and of course PERK FULFILLMENT! 

Why?

Humans have been telling each other stories since the dawn of time. 
We need stories. They entertain us. They comfort us. They teach us. They inspire us.
 I hope to do all these things with Broken Sword Chronicles. 

Why not?

In creating the short introductory video (Prelude, Herstory), we learned a great deal about producing this kind of story. Fortunately, as we learned we developed strategies for dealing with the challenges that arise. 
But there is one challenge which cannot be overcome by cunning strategies: TIME. 
All members of our team are employed at full-time jobs. Some of us are also college students. Some of us have part-time jobs along with our full-time jobs. In the spirit of transparency, I dare tell you that it took us 6 weeks to complete the first 3 minute video. Granted, if we hit certain financial milestones, we'll be able to discontinue our employment and focus full-time on this project, but that is a lofty aspiration. 
As it stands, I believe it will take well over a year to complete an entire movie. My plan for dealing with this conundrum, assuming present circumstances persist, is to release the product in chapters, as they are completed. My hope is that this will garner interest and income  enough that we can change our circumstances and focus more exclusively on this project. 

 

Can't or won't? That's okay! 

If it's not too much trouble, would you put the word out anyway? 
Indiegogo has a great sharing function for social media outlets! 
Also, our website is easy to remember: 
www.brokenswordchronicles.com
And our campaign even easier: 
www.igg.me/at/bscrhonicles

story:
Short Summary

  • Our creator's name is Murphy Howard. He has had this project on the drawing table for years and the project is finally coming together BUT we need your help for the final push into production. 
  • Below is a description of the plot of the show's main-characters. 

"Young adults are growing up in small town USA. Matthew Carter, the central figure of the show, must deal with his parents' faltering marriage while the stress of school and his conflicting thoughts on his burgeoning sexuality weigh him down - but when a new student, Cedric Jones, arrives in town, Matt begins to feel as though everything might be okay after all; that is, until a pivotal part of his past comes back into focus, and Matt learns that what happens in the past doesn't always necessarily stay there. Meanwhile, his best friend Henry must deal with the abuse which is present in his family, all while tending to his own inner demons. Elsewhere, Alexander Rivera balances a relationship with mother-to-be, Leila, with an affair in erratic Anastasia, who is pushed over the edge when her feelings of no one needing her and sense of abandonment come to a head. In the end, it becomes clear that old grudges die hard, and Matt is going to face the consequences of his past."

    What We Need & What You Get

    Here are the details for our needs and the rewards that we are offering:

    • We are working hard to minimize our expenses for this pilot episode. However, we do need to pay a team of directors, casting directors, editors, and distributors for their efforts.

    • The #1 reward will be a signed script from the pilot episode. A credit will be provided on IMDb as well as a special thank you in the ending credits of the episode. Other than that there will be a shout out "thank you" on the TV-show's official social media pages.

      An interview with any member(s) of the production is also available, should any of our pledgers be interested.

    The Impact

    The show has several important storylines including:

    • Family issues: Henry, one of our main characters, has an abusive father. Throughout the first season, we aim to depict how this influences Henry's life, his family and what decisions he is forced to make because of this. 
    • LGBTQ representation: We have several characters who are members of the LGBTQ community. These characters will help us tell important stories inspired by real life.
    • Puberty and identity: The main characters of the show are all young adults. The characters have their own stories of what it means to grow up to become your own person. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you are not personally able to help with fundraising, we ask that you please consider:

    • Raising awareness about our production
    • Share our campaign on social media so your friends will also have the opportunity to help fundraise our production. 

    Thank you!

story:
WHY DID WE CREATE THRONE PREDICTIONS?

Like many others around the world we are very excited for the 8th and final season of Game of Thrones. Many conversations around the world regarding Game of Thrones are about what will happen in the final season.

  • Who will survive?
  • Who will take the iron throne?
  • Will Jamie kill Cersei, like he killed the Mad King?
  • Will the Hound kill his brother, the Mountain?
  • ......and many others

Instead of keeping all the theories locked in our conversations we created an online website where anyone can submit their predictions completely FREE, https://thronepredictions.com 

HOW TO PLAY?

  • Simply go to https://thronepredictions.com/
  • Click on the button called "Predictions" or scroll down until you get to the "Predictions" section

  • Fill in all your predictions
  • Enter your email & Password (So you can log in to see how you are doing and that we can contact you with important information)
  • Click the "Submit" button

THE PREDICTIONS

The Main Part

The main predictions focus on predicting who will survive through the final season. You go through a list of 29 characters as seen below and simply click "Alive" or "Dead" to mark that person living or dead at the end of the season. This section is capped off with the prediction regarding who will win the Iron Throne!

 

The Bonus Part

The bonus section brings in some extra theories which you can label "True" or "False" pointing to whether they will or will not happen.

For more descriptive rules regarding the predictions please read them at https://thronepredictions.com/legal

 It is possible to change any of your predictions by contacting us on our website.

WHEN THE SHOW STARTS?

When the show starts on the 14th of April, you don't need to do anything but check back after each episode. The website will automatically update your status and the number of your points. You will be able to see how you match up against the entire world.

COMPETING WITH FRIENDS

After the predictions are submitted you can log in and see your answers in a dashboard. The dashboard also shows the average answers of all the users participating and will allow you to see the predictions of your friends.

You will also be able to see just how many people already filled in their predictions and exactly how many people (IF ANY) made the exact same predictions as you. 

When logged in and on the dashboard page every user will also be allowed to create a private group and invite his/her friends. Inside the group, the users will be able to see each other's predictions. 

As of the time when this campaign is being launched this feature (private groups) is not yet available but is planned to be implemented before April. So fill your prediction now and later we will remind you to simply connect to your friends. This feature is only one of the examples where your funds will help us with the development.

HOW WILL YOUR FUNDS HELP US?

Building the website, hosting the website, marketing the website and during the season maintaining the website has and will take quite some money, time and effort. In order to keep our services free for everyone to use we are launching this Indiegogo campaign.

Please support us so we can all have a great final season of one of the best TV shows of all time. #GOAT 

PERKS

Specifically for this Indiegogo campaign, we have created several pledge rewards which you can get for yourself by backing this project.

All the details of the perk rewards will be communicated after the project ends. Details like: shirt sizes, which predictions are yours, ...

Our perk rewards are based on the predictions that you have made. The items will serve as your MEMORY TO THE MOST AMAZING SHOW: GAME OF THRONES. 10 years in the future you will be able to show your shirt or mug with your predictions because Game of Thrones is going to be immortal.

Below you can see some rough examples of the perk rewards. The rewards will not look exactly like the images below but they are enough to provide basic ideas.

Poster with your Predictions

Mug with your Predictions

T-Shirt with your Predictions

Hoodie with your Predictions

Risks and challenges

Our website is up and running, https://thronepredictions.com/

It is FREE for all to fill in the predictions. We have the server bought for the next half a year so there are not many risks at the moment. The only one we could think of is: 
- A huge amount of users fill the predictions and we run out of storage

The service is free and incredibly fun. We also plan to develop 2 new features: private groups for friends and a global rank ladder for everyone. We need this project to go through so we can focus on the new features without distractions.
story_txt:
WHY DID WE CREATE THRONE PREDICTIONS?
Like many others around the world we are very excited for the 8th and final season of Game of Thrones. Many conversations around the world regarding Game of Thrones are about what will happen in the final season.

Who will survive?
Who will take the iron throne?
Will Jamie kill Cersei, like he killed the Mad King?
Will the Hound kill his brother, the Mountain?
......and many others

Instead of keeping all the theories locked in our conversations we created an online website where anyone can submit their predictions completely FREE, https://thronepredictions.com 
HOW TO PLAY?


Simply go to https://thronepredictions.com/

Click on the button called "Predictions" or scroll down until you get to the "Predictions" section



Fill in all your predictions
Enter your email & Password (So you can log in to see how you are doing and that we can contact you with important information)
Click the "Submit" button


THE PREDICTIONS
The Main Part
The main predictions focus on predicting who will survive through the final season. You go through a list of 29 characters as seen below and simply click "Alive" or "Dead" to mark that person living or dead at the end of the season. This section is capped off with the prediction regarding who will win the Iron Throne!

 
The Bonus Part
The bonus section brings in some extra theories which you can label "True" or "False" pointing to whether they will or will not happen.
For more descriptive rules regarding the predictions please read them at https://thronepredictions.com/legal
 It is possible to change any of your predictions by contacting us on our website.

WHEN THE SHOW STARTS?
When the show starts on the 14th of April, you don't need to do anything but check back after each episode. The website will automatically update your status and the number of your points. You will be able to see how you match up against the entire world.

COMPETING WITH FRIENDS
After the predictions are submitted you can log in and see your answers in a dashboard. The dashboard also shows the average answers of all the users participating and will allow you to see the predictions of your friends.
You will also be able to see just how many people already filled in their predictions and exactly how many people (IF ANY) made the exact same predictions as you. 

When logged in and on the dashboard page every user will also be allowed to create a private group and invite his/her friends. Inside the group, the users will be able to see each other's predictions. 
As of the time when this campaign is being launched this feature (private groups) is not yet available but is planned to be implemented before April. So fill your prediction now and later we will remind you to simply connect to your friends. This feature is only one of the examples where your funds will help us with the development.
HOW WILL YOUR FUNDS HELP US?
Building the website, hosting the website, marketing the website and during the season maintaining the website has and will take quite some money, time and effort. In order to keep our services free for everyone to use we are launching this Indiegogo campaign.
Please support us so we can all have a great final season of one of the best TV shows of all time. #GOAT 
PERKS
Specifically for this Indiegogo campaign, we have created several pledge rewards which you can get for yourself by backing this project.
All the details of the perk rewards will be communicated after the project ends. Details like: shirt sizes, which predictions are yours, ...
Our perk rewards are based on the predictions that you have made. The items will serve as your MEMORY TO THE MOST AMAZING SHOW: GAME OF THRONES. 10 years in the future you will be able to show your shirt or mug with your predictions because Game of Thrones is going to be immortal.
Below you can see some rough examples of the perk rewards. The rewards will not look exactly like the images below but they are enough to provide basic ideas.
Poster with your Predictions

Mug with your Predictions

T-Shirt with your Predictions

Hoodie with your Predictions


Risks and challenges
Our website is up and running, https://thronepredictions.com/
It is FREE for all to fill in the predictions. We have the server bought for the next half a year so there are not many risks at the moment. The only one we could think of is: - A huge amount of users fill the predictions and we run out of storage
The service is free and incredibly fun. We also plan to develop 2 new features: private groups for friends and a global rank ladder for everyone. We need this project to go through so we can focus on the new features without distractions.

story:
Who are Studio 7?

We are a small independent Film and TV studio based in Australia, we created this company because we love everything about film, and we wanted to give people the same feeling that we get when we watch a great movie or binge a new tv show.

Risks and Challenges

Obviously with film, especially a series of any kind, there are many challenges that we will face, anywhere from not being able to find the right crew members to not being able to finish the project for many reasons, it's just a fact of the industry, but we assure you that we will give 120% effort in making this project as the Director, Actors, and Producers are all massive fans of the franchise. The main risk that comes to mind is receiving a Cease and Desist from the company that owns the film rights to these characters, in which case we would have to shut down production immediately, but as long as we follow the Copyright guidelines there shouldn't be any issues with that.

The main risk that comes to mind is receiving a Cease and Desist from the company that owns the film rights to these characters, in which case we would have to shut down production immediately, but as long as we follow the Copyright guidelines there shouldn't be any issues with that.

story:
We're the creators and producers of a YouTube channel called Girl Ship TV which creates content for queer women by queer women and we need your help to make our series called Carol's A Demon! This series explores friendship between two queer women which isn't something you see a lot in media, frankly it's a miracle to get more than one queer lead in a show at all! My name is Amanda and I created the series as a way to laugh during very dark times and see queer women represented. 

We already filmed the pilot! Check it out here: https://youtu.be/GeSuhjnFtZA

If you want to see more Carol and Sofia hijinks, consider donating! We're hoping to get enough money so we can film an additional 7 episodes, see some cool demons, take a look at hell and really get a look at the apocalypse in this world. We're also going to explore friendship, love, drug deals gone bad, what it means to sacrifice and even more possessions in the remainder of the season.

BRITTANY ASHLEY
Brittany Ashley is a screenwriter and actor, best known for her work centering the queer female voice. You can watch her series “Lesbian Princess”, her short films “Unaware” and “Unplanned”, her LGBTQ news show on Logo, or listen to her Daria rewatch podcast with Laura Zak called “Sicker Sadder World.”

ASHLY PEREZ
Ashly Perez is a multi-hyphenated producer/actor/director/writer. She worked at BuzzFeed for five years as a Development Partner and co-founded its first scripted universe, BuzzFeed Violet. She’s starred in over 350 videos including the You Do You series and Unfortunatly Ashly. Perez is most known for creating content for young women, queer women, and people of color.

Writer/Creator/Producer: Amanda Holland
Creator of Girl Ship TV and writer/director of the short film Last Night Was A Mistake which just took Best Short Film and Director at the ClexaCon Film Festival. Former BuzzFeed Video producer, her goal is and will always be to write strong, complicated queer women into everything she does. 

Executive Producer/Director: Chantel Houston
Chantel Houston is a producer and creator at BuzzFeed. Over the years she has been an integral part in forming some of BuzzFeed’s largest properties including Top Knot, The NBC Olympics Snapchat Partnership, and currently Ladylike. In addition to creating shows she has produced many scripted pieces, including Lose Some Weight which garnered 2.9 million views and won the ‘Excellence in Inspiration’ Award at the 2017 Buffer Festival. Houston is best known for creating meaningful and entertaining videos for women, people of color, and underserved audiences.

 

BUDGET BREAKDOWN

As you can see the $90,000 we are hoping to raise will go to good use. We are going to film an additional 7 episodes. That will be about 17 days of shooting that we will need a full crew for, so that takes up half of our budget right there. But if we reach our goal, don't stop donating! The more money we get, the cooler the demons, the more our art dept will have to work with and the better our visual effects will look!

THE IMPACT!

As always when creating queer content, we hope to reach anyone who might be questioning their sexuality or who might be closeted. We always want to show people that there's nothing wrong with who you are, you are loved, you are accepted. With more visibility we can help those people and others to see that we are just humans like everyone else. 

RISKS & CHALLENGES!

When filming a series, it's always a little more complicated. We have to work around several actors/crew schedules so there is always a chance there could be a bump in the road and we might get the series to you later than anticipated. But with your help, we can definitely get it done and get you something funny and smart that you can watch over and over again!

OTHER WAYS TO HELP!

If you don't have the money to contribute, please share the pilot! Get the word out about Carol's A Demon, volunteer your time with us! Shoot us an email and tell us about your special skills! We love the Girl Ship community and will accept help in any form! AND if you CAN'T donate using IndieGoGo, shoot over your donation to our paypal: girlshiptv@gmail.com

story:
Our Mission: 

  • Our mission is to make yoga, meditation and a variety of wellness services accessible to everyone, especially those seeking recovery. We are dedicated to uplifting our community by helping people learn mindfulness practices that foster personal growth, strengthen positive human values and help build deep connection.

  • Our primary motivation is to witness the process of healing and self-transformation taking place in as many lives as possible. We firmly believe that we can only keep what we have by giving it away.
  • The practice of yoga is meant to be shared. Our own inner light only grows brighter when we share it with others.
  • We are a safe, inclusive space, where everyone is welcome, valued and treated with compassion. Join us at 7 Mile Rd. and Livernois, in the Bagley District of Detroit. Come exactly as you are. Welcome home!

 

Why we are here:

  • WHY is opening up one of the only LGBTQ+ owned and operated studios in Detroit. We will be creating programming that supports LGBTQ+ individuals (special workshops), classes that are inclusive. 
  • Representation, equality and equitability matter to us. These are 3 core values we hold central to our work and mission. 
  • When we open our doors this fall, WHY will serve as a community space, yoga school and wellness center.
  • Ultimately, we're here to create a welcoming, inclusive, accessible space for the Detroit community. 

 

We support our people.

  • WHY is here to support the practice of yoga and our extraordinary team members who show up every single day to do this incredible work. 
  • Our leaders are dedicated to being honest, open, respectful and supportive. 
  • WHY is committed to maintaining an equitable, uplifting environment, offering educational opportunities for growth.                              

 

We support our local community. 

  • We are a local, LGBTQ+ owned and operated business in Detroit. We serve to support our vibrant, growing community in many important ways, including partnering with local non-profit organizations to help raise funds for their causes. We support the neighborhood by offering out-reach programs and regularly examining ways in which we can help bring more impact.

 

We’re operating from a Hybrid Model.

  • WHY will be livestreaming all of our yoga classes. We will also be developing an on-demand library, with online rental and subscription options, so you may experience the benefits of a hybrid model. From the living room of your home or at our studio, you may take a class with one of our passionate teachers.

 

How you can support the journey...

  • Claim a perk
  • Contribute any amount 
  • Share the campaign on social media
  • Share the campaign with 5 people in your network
  • Send positive vibrations to the campaign

 

A letter from our Co-founders, Robyn and Melissa: 

Hi, we are Robyn and Melissa, Co-founders of Welcome Home Yoga & Wellness (WHY). We are newly married, but met 6 years ago, when the seed for WHY was first planted. With our respective backgrounds in yoga (Robyn) and massage (Melissa), and our independent experiences with healing, it wasn’t long before we began to dream of opening a yoga studio and wellness center together in Detroit. We found the perfect spot in the historical B. Siegel Building, in the Bagley District, at 7 Mile Rd. and Livernois Ave. and set our sights on manifesting our shared vision of bringing an inclusive, health and wellness space to the community.

When the pandemic struck, we continued to nurture this dream, offering classes, online & outdoors. We worked hard over this past fall and winter to secure funding for building out a new space. Moving forward with plans for expansion has been a brave, but really intentional decision. The need for yoga to be visible, accessible and become an essential part of the cultural landscape here is strong. We are so excited to be a part of the revitalization happening along the Avenue of Fashion. The journey to get here has been a dream come true.

As we emerge from what has been a challenging year and transition into our new home, we are so close to reaching our funding goal and need your support. Since planning and budgeting our buildout, the cost of materials have skyrocketed due to the pandemic. So, we are launching this campaign and are asking for your help to get us across finish line. When we open our doors this fall, we will be a community space, yoga school, and wellness center, where all may come freely just as you are and explore your feelings through breath and movement. Welcome Home, Everyone!

Much Love and Gratitude,                                                                                                                                      Robyn & Melissa
