story:
About Me...

Some of you will know me from Instagram and for those of you that don't, the following is about who I am and what I am doing...

I am Tamara, I'm 30 (ish) and from London in the UK. I am a mother to my 4 amazing children and I work from home running my small baby jewellery business, homeschooling my youngest 3 and managing my new venture 'NOT Dr.Tamara'.

I have always felt very compelled to help others. The state of the world has always bothered me and since I could think for myself I have had a burning desire to help save the planet. Whilst that may sound crazy, if you know what an empath is you will understand why I am like this. I had never been sure of how I could help save the world, but after launching my alternative health and happiness blog www.notdrtamara.com last year some strange things started happening. I had written a book a couple of years prior to my blog and shortly after the blogs launch, I started editing the book. The first night I sat down to start the edit, I realised I hated everything about the book. It was just so depressing and I didn't like it one bit. I wanted to write something that would actually help people, something that would make a difference, something that would help save the world! That night everything changed. The moon was full and I will never, ever forget that evening or that moon because that was the night I wrote 'The Happy Diet'. Yes, I wrote the book in one night, something even I find hard to believe but since writing it I have realised that the book came from the universe and was just being channeled through me (yes that may seem odd but I can't think of any other explanation!). After some editing, I released 'The Happy Diet' as an eBook. I had no money to print it properly and hadn't even thought of getting it published or an agent. After months of only a few eBook sales and everyone that had purchased it saying they wished it was a 'proper' book I realised I needed to make it into a 'proper' book. So I started the journey to try and get a publisher. As it was not a normal book and only has 40 pages, I was turned down by a few people that said it wasn't long enough and didn't even bother to read it. Something in my head told me that the only way to get this out there was to self publish and so another journey started. Self publishing was no joke. With no money I had to do everything from the edits, to the design of the cover and pages to the actual putting together of the book for print-and everything in between. I have never had any 'seed' money or investments, all the money I have used so far I have made myself either through the jewellery or consulting and this is why it has taken so long. I don't like to label myself as a 'single parent' but raising my children alone has made it harder and I have been forced to make decisions I wasn't too proud of. I always make sure they eat very well and have the clothing they need, but I haven't we haven't had a holiday in 9 years and every time I have any spare money instead of doing something with them I have put the money into the book. It has taken lot of tears, hard decisions and 3am bedtime but I did what I needed to do. This is why I am now asking for help. It is the week before the launch of the book and I have nothing left. I had hoped for a miracle instead of having to find the money for a marketing campaign to help the sales of the book but it hasn't happened. On Thursday night when I realised this book won't sell without some marketing I put it to the universe. The week had been so stressful but knowing how unproductive stress is I knew I had to let it go. So I did and then on Friday morning I woke up to this message from one of my Instagram family:

Hi Tamara.  Before I woke this morning a little message came through to say to you to set up a go fund me page to help you achieve all that you want to do. What you do is worth a lot in non monetary terms and people would be happy to donate and help. When I get a message I pass it on. I love what you do. Thanks for everything xx

Whilst this was the answer I had prayed for, it wasn't one I was comfortable with. And so another journey began, a journey of accepting that it is okay to ask for help especially if you add value to the world, which I know I do.

For the last year I have been trying to grow a community of happy minded people on Instagram in the hope that once happy and inspired, they would go on to help others and bring their own magic to the world. So many beautiful broken people have the potential and passion to be amazing, but they just simply lack the tools they need to move on from a negative past and see how great they are. This is what 'The Happy Diet' is about; giving people the tools they need to live a truly happy life. Happy people add value to the world and I've realised the best way to help the world, is to help people be happier so they can add their value. A lot of happiness is down to our state of mind, however our state of mind is based on many factors. I wrote 'The Happy Diet' to support the people who don't normally get the support they need and if I have helped you in anyway and you wanted to help me back, this is how you can.

If you help support this campaign you will not only be helping others by giving them the chance to buy my book, but you will be helping me support my family. Whilst my dreams have always been to help others, I live very close to the poverty line in a small flat with my 4 children who all depend solely on me and currently share one bedroom. I would like the opportunity to get us out of this flat as well as give them all the things they deserve. I have put too much hard work and soul into this book to have it fail now and if you can help support me and this book in anyway, you will be helping to save the world...

 

What I Need & What You Get

I need to make £11,000. This money will cover the costs of a hugely successful pr marketing campaign and allow me to print a big run of books to sell after the campaign is successful. I will also be able to continue to improve what I do on Instagram and concentrate on more in-depth videos for YouTube as I'll finally be able to invest in some proper recording equipment.

 

Perks

£5-£29

Any contribution made between £5-29 will receive a handwritten card from me and the kids. Each card will contain a special message from one of the children-it may even be the baby! Once you have made your contribution, please send an email with the subject 'Card Claim' and your address to: tamara@notdrtamara.com with a screenshot of your payment. *you do not have to claim perks, your donation can remain anonymous and we will send you a mental thanks.

£30-£64

Any contribution made between £30-64 will receive a canvas cotton bag featuring one of Amelia's designs. There are 3 designs available, 'Love Cloud', 'Queen of Love' and 'In love'. A design will be picked at random by Amelia and sent to you. Once you have made your contribution, please send an email with the subject 'Bag Claim' to tamara@notdrtamara.com with your delivery address and screenshot of your payment. *you do not have to claim perks, your donation can remain anonymous and we will send you a big mental thanks.

£65-£100

Any contribution made between £65-£100 will receive a handwritten thank you card from me and the kids AND a signed copy of 'The Happy Diet'. Once you have made your contribution, please send an email with the subject 'Book Claim' to tamara@notdrtamara.com with your delivery address and screenshot of your payment. Please also send details if it is to be sent as a gift. *you do not have to claim perks, your donation can remain anonymous and we will send you a VERY big mental thanks. There is an option to have this sent as gift to someone you love.

£100+

Any contribution made above £100 will receive a free 1hr consultation with me. In that hour I can help you achieve anything you desire. After the consultation you will receive a personalised plan to help you live the life you want. Once you have made your contribution, please send an email with the subject 'Consultation Claim' to tamara@notdrtamara.com with a screenshot of your payment and preferred date and time (please note my consultation slots are on Wed/Thur/Fri 9-11pm). *you do not have to claim perks, your donation can remain anonymous and we will send you a ridiculously large mental thanks.

£2000+

For anyone that makes a contribution this generous, I will make a personal appearance at your party/event of choice and sing a terrible rendition of Whitney Houstons 'I will always love you' to them to thank you for the support! I will also stay for a while and try and coerce your guests into buying my book. Once you have made your contribution, please send an email with the subject ' Party with Tamara' to tamara@notdrtamara.com with the date of your event, dress code and screenshot of your payment. Please note unless you are willing to fly me and my family to your party/event, it needs to be UK based. *you do not have to claim perks, your donation can remain anonymous and we will send you a video of us singing how much we love you instead!

THANK YOU!

Thank you to all of you that contribute and for those of you that can't afford it, please just send me some love instead and help spread the word about 'The Happy Diet'.  Much Love to you ALL!

 

For anyone interested in the story of when I was not happy, how I became happy and why I wrote 'The Happy Diet' please read on...

Looking back, there were many things that contributed to the decline of my mental health. At 14 and what is probably the most pivotal age with regards to development, I was sexually assaulted and because of how it happened I felt I had to keep it a secret. I also had never met my biological father and having an absent parent often makes a child feel as though they did something wrong or were not good enough. Team those things together and you had one very hurt, angry and depressed little girl. For years I battled my darkness on my own and it just existed silently in my mind. I am now a mother of 4 amazing children and it was shortly after the birth of my first son (12 years ago) and death of my brother that I finally sought help. I had never touched hard drugs but had always smoked cannabis because it helped to quieten my thoughts. However, it got to a point when it was no longer quietening them and something had to give. So I started to see a drugs counsellor and after seeing him for about 8 months I finally hit rock bottom. Things were so bad, I didn't want to exist anymore and I was on the verge of ending it all. I called my counsellor the day I was going to kill myself and told him I wanted him to help me get care for my son and asked him to call child services. I think he knew what I was going to do and he asked me to go in and see him straight away. That's when he gave me the book that saved my life. He handed me a small book called 'The Secret' and begged me to read it. I went home and that night I sat on the floor of my bedsit kitchen and read the book cover to cover. The book changed EVERYTHING and in 4 hours my life was suddenly very different. I realised that we are the creators of our life and that we are the ones who have control over it. I realised I had caused all my own problems and as hard as that was to swallow, I had finally found hope because I knew that if I had caused it I could just as easily change it. From that moment everything was different. Something just clicked. I knew I couldn't change the past but I felt powerful knowing I could change the future. I had spent so many years being angry and not living that I now wanted to know everything about being happy and living with love and purpose.

10 years on from being on the most immense personal growth journey, I felt it was time to start helping others by sharing what I had learned. I didn't want the pain I went through to be pointless, I wanted to use my knowledge and experience to help inspire others and give them hope. My book is EVERYTHING I have learnt over the last 10 years that actually keeps you happy and sane. Doctors are very quick to put us on medication that might not be needed if we all had the right tools to begin with. The book is like a giant tool box and even though it's called  'The Happy Diet',  it's about a lot more than just food; it's a way of living that will genuinely help people feel better mentally, physically and spiritually. Eating clean, meditation, yoga, gratitude, social media restrictions and television bans are just some of the wisdom I share in this book. People wonder why it is so cheap but as a single parent who has suffered mentally and never had much money, I know a lot of the people that need my book can't afford it which is why I kept the price low-everyone deserves to be happy regardless of financial status. All I hope is that one day my book will save lives too. 

If you have supported this campaign in any way I want you to know just how much you are going to be helping not only me and my family, but everyone else. Through my own pain I have been given the power to help others, but you are giving me the power to spread my help even further and are allowing me to continue to grow what I love doing and offering me an opportunity to benefit others. There is a name for people like you and it's 'Human Angel'. So to all you angels that are supporting me, THANK YOU.
story_txt: About Me...Some of you will know me from Instagram and for those of you that don't, the following is about who I am and what I am doing...I am Tamara, I'm 30 (ish) and from London in the UK. I am a mother to my 4 amazing children and I work from home running my small baby jewellery business, homeschooling my youngest 3 and managing my new venture 'NOT Dr.Tamara'.I have always felt very compelled to help others. The state of the world has always bothered me and since I could think for myself I have had a burning desire to help save the planet. Whilst that may sound crazy, if you know what an empath is you will understand why I am like this. I had never been sure of how I could help save the world, but after launching my alternative health and happiness blog www.notdrtamara.com last year some strange things started happening. I had written a book a couple of years prior to my blog and shortly after the blogs launch, I started editing the book. The first night I sat down to start the edit, I realised I hated everything about the book. It was just so depressing and I didn't like it one bit. I wanted to write something that would actually help people, something that would make a difference, something that would help save the world! That night everything changed. The moon was full and I will never, ever forget that evening or that moon because that was the night I wrote 'The Happy Diet'. Yes, I wrote the book in one night, something even I find hard to believe but since writing it I have realised that the book came from the universe and was just being channeled through me (yes that may seem odd but I can't think of any other explanation!). After some editing, I released 'The Happy Diet' as an eBook. I had no money to print it properly and hadn't even thought of getting it published or an agent. After months of only a few eBook sales and everyone that had purchased it saying they wished it was a 'proper' book I realised I needed to make it into a 'proper' book. So I started the journey to try and get a publisher. As it was not a normal book and only has 40 pages, I was turned down by a few people that said it wasn't long enough and didn't even bother to read it. Something in my head told me that the only way to get this out there was to self publish and so another journey started. Self publishing was no joke. With no money I had to do everything from the edits, to the design of the cover and pages to the actual putting together of the book for print-and everything in between. I have never had any 'seed' money or investments, all the money I have used so far I have made myself either through the jewellery or consulting and this is why it has taken so long. I don't like to label myself as a 'single parent' but raising my children alone has made it harder and I have been forced to make decisions I wasn't too proud of. I always make sure they eat very well and have the clothing they need, but I haven't we haven't had a holiday in 9 years and every time I have any spare money instead of doing something with them I have put the money into the book. It has taken lot of tears, hard decisions and 3am bedtime but I did what I needed to do. This is why I am now asking for help. It is the week before the launch of the book and I have nothing left. I had hoped for a miracle instead of having to find the money for a marketing campaign to help the sales of the book but it hasn't happened. On Thursday night when I realised this book won't sell without some marketing I put it to the universe. The week had been so stressful but knowing how unproductive stress is I knew I had to let it go. So I did and then on Friday morning I woke up to this message from one of my Instagram family:Hi Tamara.  Before I woke this morning a little message came through to say to you to set up a go fund me page to help you achieve all that you want to do. What you do is worth a lot in non monetary terms and people would be happy to donate and help. When I get a message I pass it on. I love what you do. Thanks for everything xxWhilst this was the answer I had prayed for, it wasn't one I was comfortable with. And so another journey began, a journey of accepting that it is okay to ask for help especially if you add value to the world, which I know I do.For the last year I have been trying to grow a community of happy minded people on Instagram in the hope that once happy and inspired, they would go on to help others and bring their own magic to the world. So many beautiful broken people have the potential and passion to be amazing, but they just simply lack the tools they need to move on from a negative past and see how great they are. This is what 'The Happy Diet' is about; giving people the tools they need to live a truly happy life. Happy people add value to the world and I've realised the best way to help the world, is to help people be happier so they can add their value. A lot of happiness is down to our state of mind, however our state of mind is based on many factors. I wrote 'The Happy Diet' to support the people who don't normally get the support they need and if I have helped you in anyway and you wanted to help me back, this is how you can.If you help support this campaign you will not only be helping others by giving them the chance to buy my book, but you will be helping me support my family. Whilst my dreams have always been to help others, I live very close to the poverty line in a small flat with my 4 children who all depend solely on me and currently share one bedroom. I would like the opportunity to get us out of this flat as well as give them all the things they deserve. I have put too much hard work and soul into this book to have it fail now and if you can help support me and this book in anyway, you will be helping to save the world... What I Need & What You GetI need to make £11,000. This money will cover the costs of a hugely successful pr marketing campaign and allow me to print a big run of books to sell after the campaign is successful. I will also be able to continue to improve what I do on Instagram and concentrate on more in-depth videos for YouTube as I'll finally be able to invest in some proper recording equipment. Perks£5-£29Any contribution made between £5-29 will receive a handwritten card from me and the kids. Each card will contain a special message from one of the children-it may even be the baby! Once you have made your contribution, please send an email with the subject 'Card Claim' and your address to: tamara@notdrtamara.com with a screenshot of your payment. *you do not have to claim perks, your donation can remain anonymous and we will send you a mental thanks.£30-£64Any contribution made between £30-64 will receive a canvas cotton bag featuring one of Amelia's designs. There are 3 designs available, 'Love Cloud', 'Queen of Love' and 'In love'. A design will be picked at random by Amelia and sent to you. Once you have made your contribution, please send an email with the subject 'Bag Claim' to tamara@notdrtamara.com with your delivery address and screenshot of your payment. *you do not have to claim perks, your donation can remain anonymous and we will send you a big mental thanks.£65-£100Any contribution made between £65-£100 will receive a handwritten thank you card from me and the kids AND a signed copy of 'The Happy Diet'. Once you have made your contribution, please send an email with the subject 'Book Claim' to tamara@notdrtamara.com with your delivery address and screenshot of your payment. Please also send details if it is to be sent as a gift. *you do not have to claim perks, your donation can remain anonymous and we will send you a VERY big mental thanks. There is an option to have this sent as gift to someone you love.£100+Any contribution made above £100 will receive a free 1hr consultation with me. In that hour I can help you achieve anything you desire. After the consultation you will receive a personalised plan to help you live the life you want. Once you have made your contribution, please send an email with the subject 'Consultation Claim' to tamara@notdrtamara.com with a screenshot of your payment and preferred date and time (please note my consultation slots are on Wed/Thur/Fri 9-11pm). *you do not have to claim perks, your donation can remain anonymous and we will send you a ridiculously large mental thanks.£2000+For anyone that makes a contribution this generous, I will make a personal appearance at your party/event of choice and sing a terrible rendition of Whitney Houstons 'I will always love you' to them to thank you for the support! I will also stay for a while and try and coerce your guests into buying my book. Once you have made your contribution, please send an email with the subject ' Party with Tamara' to tamara@notdrtamara.com with the date of your event, dress code and screenshot of your payment. Please note unless you are willing to fly me and my family to your party/event, it needs to be UK based. *you do not have to claim perks, your donation can remain anonymous and we will send you a video of us singing how much we love you instead!THANK YOU!Thank you to all of you that contribute and for those of you that can't afford it, please just send me some love instead and help spread the word about 'The Happy Diet'.  Much Love to you ALL! For anyone interested in the story of when I was not happy, how I became happy and why I wrote 'The Happy Diet' please read on...Looking back, there were many things that contributed to the decline of my mental health. At 14 and what is probably the most pivotal age with regards to development, I was sexually assaulted and because of how it happened I felt I had to keep it a secret. I also had never met my biological father and having an absent parent often makes a child feel as though they did something wrong or were not good enough. Team those things together and you had one very hurt, angry and depressed little girl. For years I battled my darkness on my own and it just existed silently in my mind. I am now a mother of 4 amazing children and it was shortly after the birth of my first son (12 years ago) and death of my brother that I finally sought help. I had never touched hard drugs but had always smoked cannabis because it helped to quieten my thoughts. However, it got to a point when it was no longer quietening them and something had to give. So I started to see a drugs counsellor and after seeing him for about 8 months I finally hit rock bottom. Things were so bad, I didn't want to exist anymore and I was on the verge of ending it all. I called my counsellor the day I was going to kill myself and told him I wanted him to help me get care for my son and asked him to call child services. I think he knew what I was going to do and he asked me to go in and see him straight away. That's when he gave me the book that saved my life. He handed me a small book called 'The Secret' and begged me to read it. I went home and that night I sat on the floor of my bedsit kitchen and read the book cover to cover. The book changed EVERYTHING and in 4 hours my life was suddenly very different. I realised that we are the creators of our life and that we are the ones who have control over it. I realised I had caused all my own problems and as hard as that was to swallow, I had finally found hope because I knew that if I had caused it I could just as easily change it. From that moment everything was different. Something just clicked. I knew I couldn't change the past but I felt powerful knowing I could change the future. I had spent so many years being angry and not living that I now wanted to know everything about being happy and living with love and purpose.10 years on from being on the most immense personal growth journey, I felt it was time to start helping others by sharing what I had learned. I didn't want the pain I went through to be pointless, I wanted to use my knowledge and experience to help inspire others and give them hope. My book is EVERYTHING I have learnt over the last 10 years that actually keeps you happy and sane. Doctors are very quick to put us on medication that might not be needed if we all had the right tools to begin with. The book is like a giant tool box and even though it's called  'The Happy Diet',  it's about a lot more than just food; it's a way of living that will genuinely help people feel better mentally, physically and spiritually. Eating clean, meditation, yoga, gratitude, social media restrictions and television bans are just some of the wisdom I share in this book. People wonder why it is so cheap but as a single parent who has suffered mentally and never had much money, I know a lot of the people that need my book can't afford it which is why I kept the price low-everyone deserves to be happy regardless of financial status. All I hope is that one day my book will save lives too. If you have supported this campaign in any way I want you to know just how much you are going to be helping not only me and my family, but everyone else. Through my own pain I have been given the power to help others, but you are giving me the power to spread my help even further and are allowing me to continue to grow what I love doing and offering me an opportunity to benefit others. There is a name for people like you and it's 'Human Angel'. So to all you angels that are supporting me, THANK YOU.

story:
The Divine Mela9 Project

 

Greetings--you made it! Welcome to the official offering page for the "Divine Mela9 Project!" We are humbled and grateful to be at your service.

 

Patrice also known as Peace speaking.  I am a Chicago native who is no stranger to the traumas of poverty and lack of natural resources.  As a spiritual being, I have spent my adult life healing from generational suffering and the everyday stresses of the African displaced.  Along my journey, I met visionary “Akashi” of "Living Akashi 22 Day Transformation Journi " which encompasses the basis for the method; who has graciously provided the land in Portland, Jamaica where the "Melanin Movin Project" calls home. Akashi was informed of a compromised immune system at a hospital visit in 2009 where she was inspired to create an alternative healing space for those on their personal Journi of Self Love, healing and transformation.

 

Together, we present this land "Divine Mela9" as a safe space for us all to be guided back to a life of eco wellness and local sustainability. The Land is intended for offering space to paid guest who require support and clear facilitators that are qualified to support. Also, volunteers who are available up to 3 months.

 

What is "Living Akashi 22 Day Transformation Journi"

Living Akashi is a path to aligning ones self with your inner ability to heal which begins by making a commitment to live life abundantly.  Supporting others on their personal journey to wholeness by sharing the message of self love and how to align with it is the fuel that continues to charge her soul today. Daily dedication to eating vegan living foods, participating in mind/body therapy through meditation, yoga and intentional love, herbal compounds, a naturally healing environment and a guide to assist in your personal transformation is theJourni. After 9 years of global travel, experiencing very personal and intimate stories,  disheartening diagnosis and transformations to many, she has been and furthermore ready to realize this vision in an environment suited for healing.  

In 2017,  this sustainable wholeness community in the rich and healing parish of Portland, Jamaica was birthed. To learn more about the land visit http://simplylocal.life/living-akashi-guesthouses/

 

What is the "Melanin Movin' Project?"

In the spirit of my ascendants, "The Melanin Movin’ Project " rekindles through community and hands-on development.  Additionally, it’s a detox from pollution, pesticides, and mass production towards clean air and fresh water; local resources; sustainability and living with (honoring) the land. So many of my beloved melanin mutuals have been isolated through cultural and environmental disconnect -- the Melanin Movin’ Project is a pledge to reunite us with our ancestral roots.  

But a community is only as prosperous as the health of its members.  Healing ourselves will be a crucial component in our work. My journey in self healing began through a platform I created via Youtube called Free and Formed.  In 2014, I began documenting my journey towards a more fulfilling life free from judgments, fears, and everyday tedium that weighed on my mind. In nourishing myself, the Melanin Movin’ Project was born.  Ultimately, the goal is to be the catalyst into your own self-healing and discovery through communal accord. In other words, you don’t have to do it alone.

 

What We Need & What You Get

All donations to the “Divine Mela9' Project”  will support the projects' services, as well as the services and land development provided through Living Akashi Guesthouse & Gardens and the Melanin Movin Project.  Our collective goal is to reach $33,000 at minimum in profits and/or donations.

 

The vision is to utilize Divine Mela9s’ 10 acres of secured land with nine cottages for long term healing therapy.  Other exciting features include:

  • a sustainable wellness center
  • a community organic farm
  • a vegan food cafe
  • a fabulous retreat destination
  • a martial arts training ground
  • a meditation and yoga center
  • educational workshops
  • an indigenous arts culture and music therapy space
  • and an outdoor spa!

 

In donating, you will foster a community where members practice self-sufficiency, holistic and sustainable living, and creativity.  Our sustainable development concepts include bio construction, rainwater harvesting, solar energy, and organic farming while using healing arts such as yoga, meditation, live vegan foods, plus sound and water therapy.

Where does my donation go?

  • The goal of $33,000 would cover the total cost of: clearing land; farming; building structures, bridge and pathways; designing with artisans; upkeeping the waterfalls, springs, and caves; creating a vegan cafe; and any other additional requirements.
  • We will use $9,000 this season to focus on the infrastructure projects.
  • A portion of the profits from Divine Mela9 will go towards neighboring communities.  We will build a cultural arts and music center that will provide work opportunities in farming and the arts.
  • Another portion will go to paying the workers to complete this project for our dreamland, as well as costs to help provide the funding for the start up amenities to make our community the most memorable and transformative experience ever.

Several generous supporters have agreed to be present to assist by volunteering their time to farm, build and share their experience of "how to create" a sustainable community.

 

We welcome you to join this effort!

Stay Connected

Here are even more ways to contribute directly and stay updated!

Other ways to donate:

  • Paypal: https://www.paypal.me/peacetrice
  • Paypal: https://www.paypal.me/livingakashi
  • CashApp: http://cash.me/$freeandformed

KIT Follow me (Patrice) and Akashi on Social Media!

  • Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/freeandformed/
  • Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/livingakashi/
  • Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/freeandformed
  • Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/akashijourni
  • Tumblr: http://freeandformed.tumblr.com/

story:
¡Hola! Somos la Asociación Proyecto Peruanos

Una ONGD que tiene la misión de empoderar a jóvenes líderes a ejecutar proyectos sociales, fomentando solidaridad entre peruanos. Nuestro modelo flexible nos permite adaptarnos a las necesidades de la población o coyuntura y temas de interés de los voluntarios.

Tenemos 3 programas:

  • Incubadora: Somos una red de iniciativas voluntarias, buscamos empoderar a jóvenes líderes peruanos. Incubadora APP, hoy en día se encuentra orientado a responder ante el COVID-19. 
  • Proyecto Hogar: Construimos hogares para poblados vulnerables y familias en extrema pobreza.
  • Reconstruyendo Vidas: En conjunto con nuestros aliados Ayuda en Acción, PREDES y UDEP tenemos un proyecto  co-financiado por la Unión Europea en la comunidad de Cura Mori-Piura. Buscamos estabilidad económica y social para la comunidad que apoyamos.

¡Esta campaña está orientada a nuestro programa Incubadora!

Incubamos y respaldamos iniciativas voluntarias de los nuevos proyectos sociales que deseen realizar jóvenes líderes peruanos, estos estarán orientados a combatir el Covid-19.

Ofrecemos:

  • Mentoría: Otorgamos una guía para impulsar las iniciativas incubadas.
  • Redes: Contactos de donantes y beneficiarios.
  • Backoffice: Áreas de soporte pro-bono en marketing, finanzas, legal y contabilidad.

Para poder continuar con nuestro programa necesitamos de ti, una alma altruista que desee contribuir con su granito de arena.

¿Cómo puedes apoyar?

  • Donando: Tu donación puede cambiar la vida de una familia peruana que vive en extrema pobreza.
  • Compartiendo: Puedes compartir nuestras redes sociales, para tener un mayor alcance de donantes y voluntarios.
    • Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/proyecto_peruanos/?hl...
    • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AsociacionProyectoPeru...
    • LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/asociaci%C3%B3...

¡Ayúdanos a seguir ayudando!

¡Llegó tu momento de accionar contra el Covid-19! Tu donación nos permitirá seguir ayudando a las poblaciones más vulnerables del Perú. Existen muchas zonas emergentes en Perú que no cuentan con servicios básicos y trabajan informalmente, la crisis del Covid-19 nos afecta a todos, pero más a los peruanos de bajos recursos que no se encuentran en planilla y viven de los ingresos que generan por día. En Perú la cuarentena inicio el 16 de marzo y se ha ido prolongando hasta la fecha, y seguirá prolongándose dejando a estas familias sin una fuente de ingreso, ni servicios básicos para poder combatir al Covid-19.

Nuestro programa Incubadora buscamos motivar a jóvenes lideres peruanos para vivir una experiencia centrada en el voluntariado donde desarrollan empatía, solidaridad y colaboración. Las iniciativas son 100% voluntarias y pueden responder a cualquier ámbito de preocupación del voluntario. Incubadora APP, es el conducto que se necesitaba para que los jóvenes peruanos puedan crear su propia iniciativa voluntaria y puedan ayudar a las poblaciones más vulnerables.

Una idea puede convertirse en el cambio que necesitamos.

Nuestro programa Proyecto Hogar nacido de Incubadora acaba de concluir su primera campaña dirigida al Covid-19, donde se entregaron 70 canastas con víveres a las familias de la comunidad de Maria Caycho, Cañete. Cumplir con la cuarentena es difícil y más aun si no se cuenta con ingreso mensual o servicios básicos. Por ello, nuestros programas están orientados al servicio de la comunidad para poder hacerle frente al Covid-19.

¡Unidos podemos todos!

La pandemia del Covid-19 viene afectando a todo el mundo, causando muchos estragos en las poblaciones vulnerables de cada país. Una manera de apoyar a nuestros gobiernos y a nuestros compatriotas es donando o compartiendo la labor de las organizaciones que estén cubriendo las necesidades de las poblaciones más vulnerables y afectadas. La globalización y la conectividad hoy nos permiten saber lo que sucede en todo el mundo, usemos ese conocimiento para accionar y apoyar a esos países que necesitan de todos.

Te invitamos a mirar las cosas desde otra perspectiva, para poder aprender y crecer. Unidos podremos terminar con esta pandemia, pero necesitamos de todos y todas, el momento de unirnos como humanidad llegó, atrévete a ser participe del cambio. Seamos colaborativos, no competitivos ¡Juntos podemos hacer historia!

Proyecto Hogar: Construimos hogares para poblados vulnerables y familias en extrema pobreza.

Reconstruyendo Vidas: En conjunto con nuestros aliados Ayuda en Acción, PREDES y UDEP tenemos un proyecto  co-financiado por la Unión Europea en la comunidad de Cura Mori-Piura. Buscamos estabilidad económica y social para la comunidad que apoyamos.

¡Esta campaña está orientada a nuestro programa Incubadora!
Incubamos y respaldamos iniciativas voluntarias de los nuevos proyectos sociales que deseen realizar jóvenes líderes peruanos, estos estarán orientados a combatir el Covid-19.
Ofrecemos:


Mentoría: Otorgamos una guía para impulsar las iniciativas incubadas.

Redes: Contactos de donantes y beneficiarios.

Backoffice: Áreas de soporte pro-bono en marketing, finanzas, legal y contabilidad.

Para poder continuar con nuestro programa necesitamos de ti, una alma altruista que desee contribuir con su granito de arena.

¿Cómo puedes apoyar?


Donando: Tu donación puede cambiar la vida de una familia peruana que vive en extrema pobreza.

Compartiendo: Puedes compartir nuestras redes sociales, para tener un mayor alcance de donantes y voluntarios.
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/proyecto_peruanos/?hl...

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AsociacionProyectoPeru...

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/asociaci%C3%B3...



¡Ayúdanos a seguir ayudando!¡Llegó tu momento de accionar contra el Covid-19! Tu donación nos permitirá seguir ayudando a las poblaciones más vulnerables del Perú. Existen muchas zonas emergentes en Perú que no cuentan con servicios básicos y trabajan informalmente, la crisis del Covid-19 nos afecta a todos, pero más a los peruanos de bajos recursos que no se encuentran en planilla y viven de los ingresos que generan por día. En Perú la cuarentena inicio el 16 de marzo y se ha ido prolongando hasta la fecha, y seguirá prolongándose dejando a estas familias sin una fuente de ingreso, ni servicios básicos para poder combatir al Covid-19.
Nuestro programa Incubadora buscamos motivar a jóvenes lideres peruanos para vivir una experiencia centrada en el voluntariado donde desarrollan empatía, solidaridad y colaboración. Las iniciativas son 100% voluntarias y pueden responder a cualquier ámbito de preocupación del voluntario. Incubadora APP, es el conducto que se necesitaba para que los jóvenes peruanos puedan crear su propia iniciativa voluntaria y puedan ayudar a las poblaciones más vulnerables.
Una idea puede convertirse en el cambio que necesitamos.
Nuestro programa Proyecto Hogar nacido de Incubadora acaba de concluir su primera campaña dirigida al Covid-19, donde se entregaron 70 canastas con víveres a las familias de la comunidad de Maria Caycho, Cañete. Cumplir con la cuarentena es difícil y más aun si no se cuenta con ingreso mensual o servicios básicos. Por ello, nuestros programas están orientados al servicio de la comunidad para poder hacerle frente al Covid-19.
¡Unidos podemos todos!
La pandemia del Covid-19 viene afectando a todo el mundo, causando muchos estragos en las poblaciones vulnerables de cada país. Una manera de apoyar a nuestros gobiernos y a nuestros compatriotas es donando o compartiendo la labor de las organizaciones que estén cubriendo las necesidades de las poblaciones más vulnerables y afectadas. La globalización y la conectividad hoy nos permiten saber lo que sucede en todo el mundo, usemos ese conocimiento para accionar y apoyar a esos países que necesitan de todos.
Te invitamos a mirar las cosas desde otra perspectiva, para poder aprender y crecer. Unidos podremos terminar con esta pandemia, pero necesitamos de todos y todas, el momento de unirnos como humanidad llegó, atrévete a ser participe del cambio. Seamos colaborativos, no competitivos ¡Juntos podemos hacer historia!

story:
CatchUp Salah, with the will of Allah (SWT), will be a free app designed to help Muslims all over the world with a fundamental pillar of Islam- Prayers. Take a look below:

 

Abu Huraira (RA) reported that The Messenger of Allah, peace and blessings be upon him said: 

“The first action for which a servant of Allah will be held accountable on the Day of Resurrection will be his prayers”

CatchUp Salah will be designed to Insha Allah help Muslims of all ages calculate missed prayers with ease and peace of mind. To be able to simply be presented with a numerical figure that directs you to your responsibility as a Muslim: reading 5 times a day.

Insha Allah as you age - the team wanted to be able to make it achievable to not only calculate the missed prayers, but to CatchUp whilst reading your current prayers too.

Finally, to develop an option that notifies next of kin how many outstanding prayers the user passed on with: meaning their accountability to prayers can be settled either through Fidya.

The goal of CatchUp Salah is to Insha Allah reach out and enrich Muslims by bringing salah back into their hearts.

 

 

 

 

However, we can't do this without you. Please donate generously towards this cause, May Allah accept your charity and reward you for every prayer read in the years to come. Ameen.

'for every prayer recorded, you will be rewarded, Insha Allah'

story:
Short Summary

My story began 20 years ago.  I was a special education teacher working with elementary students that were diagnosed with learning disabilities and emotional problems. Similar to my background, these children came from single parent homes and grew up in economically depressed areas.  I can remember how hard these parents worked and how they looked to professionals, like teachers and doctors, to help raise healthy families. Unfortunately, medication was often seen as the answer.

In the late 90's I was fortunate to learn about a hospital that offered alternative and complimentary therapies to children with special needs - an innovative practice that was clearly ahead of its time. 

It was then that my dream to introduce communities to holistic wellness was born.

I began a journey which increased my business knowledge while exploring the benefits of holistic wellness in my own life.  Among the therapies I've experienced are acupuncture, aromatherapy, Ayurveda, chiropractic, food cleanses, Craniosacral therapy, crystal healing, massage, meditation, reflexology, Rolfing, Shiatsu, holistic vision therapy, sound therapy and various forms of yoga.  I also learned to appreciate the principles of Feng Shui (harmonizing your inner world with your outer environment).

In 2012, I was blessed to connect with the healing energy of Reiki and its intuitive nature. I studied to become a level 2 Reiki Practitioner while working at Boston Children's Hospital.  Reiki is a hands-on, light or soft touch technique which channels the universal life force energy (energy found in all living things) to help restore energetic balance within our own bodies.  It releases tension or stress, produces deep relaxation/calm and can even provide an energy boost if needed. Reiki activates our body's natural healing process. 

After 5 years of working with Reiki energy, I've realized that Reiki is the first step toward opening a holistic wellness center for families particularly those with children that have special needs.

I've been very fortunate to have patients, friends and family that have experienced Reiki through me.  I would love to share this gift with you all!  

What We Need & What You Get

Your donation will help the business get off the ground.  Namely:

  • Cost of incorporating and registering with the city - $605
  • Cost of Trademark protection - $550
  • Marketing costs including branding, pamphlets/business cards, website creation - $4,000
  • General Supplies - sheets, pillow cases, blankets, liners for headrest, massage table - $500
  • Business technology - $620

Your support is greatly appreciated!  Consider Reiki for yourself or others. With a donation of $25 or more you can spread the gift of Reiki!

The Impact

Achieving the bigger goal starts with a small step.  Together we can make a difference in our own lives and that of those around us.   

Consider Reiki if you're looking to alleviate physical, emotional and mental pain associated with some of the following life challenges:

Insomnia                             Emotional Trauma                Eating Disorders

Headaches                         Negativity                                 Self-harm Behaviors 

Colds                                   ADD/ADHD                              Physical Pain 

Cancer                                Anxiety                                       Self Expression

Risks & Challenges

To start on a successful path I have been working with mentors at SCORE, seeking the advice of friends who have expertise in marketing, finance, holistic wellness and entrepreneurship, taking Reiki-related business courses, as well as, collaborating with other Reiki Practitioners in Massachusetts.  My educational background includes a Masters in Special Education, a Masters in Business Administration, a Certificate in Entrepreneurship and Reiki Level 2 Certification.

I plan to open my office in the Greater Boston area mid-August with a focus on families (children/siblings/parents) and children with special needs.  Currently, there are few practitioners in Boston that specialize in working with these populations. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you share my vision for healthier families please spread the word! Indiegogo makes it easy. Please feel free to reach out to me if you have any questions or think of any other ways to help.

story:
Our Vision

At Manaòs Beauty, we aim to set an unprecedented standard for quality ingredients with deeply nourishing and concentrated formulas to set the bar high as one of the most reliable and trustworthy companies in holistic skincare... This is no small task and we need your support!

Why we need your Support...

It is time for us to scale and expand this brand to a level where anyone who wants to experience Manaòs is able to. Our commitment to quality ingredients and botanical wisdom is too BIG to play small. We are here to serve the collective well-being and we want to expand to meet the needs of our customers and communities.

The demand for our products is currently greater than the supply we can produce from our home kitchen. After selling over one-thousand units of our top 3 products, many of the initial hurdles in product development and formulation have been addressed during the past 3 years

Imagine A World…

That loves itself from the inside out. A place where people love their skin and bodies with equal gratitude as the earth they walk on. Where learning opportunities and sacred rituals are shared in abundance, encouraging a synergistic relationship with plants & a deeper practice of self-love…

Aychele’s Inspiration...

Upon moving to Montreal from Brazil, Aychele continued her work as a massage therapist where she encountered many patients with similar skin challenges as herself. It wasn’t long before she began to craft her own remedies to share in 2014. As the positive feedback grew… she knew she was on to something.

This spark of inspiration ignited an insatiable curiosity for plant knowledge that sent Aychele on a  quest to source superior ingredients. Aychele trained with the world’s top herbalists, researching botanicals rich in phyto-nutrients that retained maximum moisture for their own survival... thereby benefitting our skin immensly.

Back to the Amazon...

As she immersed herself deeper in the wisdom of plants, a divine synchronicity would bring her full circle… back to her Brazilian roots… back to the forest of her childhood dreams… back to the Amazon. A place where she uncovered the truth she was seeking… a truth about the connection between humans and plants.

As a tribute to an ancient tribe of the forest… Manaòs Beauty was born. A few years later, in 2017, Aychele married Alexander Hill and Manaòs Beauty was brought to the United States.

OUR PLAN:

In 2 months... we will grow our team, move production outside of our home, and fine-tune our packaging.

  • Once our first employee is trained, we will seek a small commercial facility to produce and bottle the ingredients of our formulas. We will begin using a drop-shipping service to maximize order fulfillment & efficiency. 
  • Drawing on Alexander’s experience in commercial real estate, we intend to find an ideal location at an affordable rent here in California.
  • We will upgrade our packaging, bottles, printing, and labeling to meet all standards for UPC barcode,  govt. regulations, & retail requirements to be carried in larger stores and online.

In 3 months… as production increases at our facility, we will continually expand to more retail stores & yoga studios. We will also begin to train independent distributors to give workshops and carry our products.

  • We will expand our retail partnerships from 6 stores (at present) to 30+ retail stores & yoga studios on the East & West Coast. Predominantly located in New York & California. 

In 4-5 months...  Production is dialed-in to handle more orders, We will re-invest 25% of existing profits in online marketing and advertising campaigns to increase our online sales.

  • We will continue promoting brand awareness with courses, webinars, and marketing strategies to drive traffic to our website with SEO, Facebook, Google, Youtube & Instagram.

6 Months and Beyond.. Our team will continue with community outreach at yoga studios & stores to promote skin care rituals of self-love and the overall mission of Manaòs as a company. We will host retreats alongside the BOA Foundation in the Amazon to visit the tribes we support... while sharing our journey with you! At this point, we will be able to establish a long-term plan of monetary contribution to the tribes we are working with.

2019 Revenue Goal- $500,000+ in Net Profit. Making our first year-end contribution to the BOA Foundation for the Tribes of the Amazon Basin.

2020 Revenue Goal- $1M+ in Net Profit.

2021 and Beyond... Establishing ourselves as a successful startup story in the world of natural skincare. We will inspire more companies to grow and prosper with similar ethical models. We envision sharing our story at festivals, events, via online platforms, & podcasts. Our long term projects will include buying land to harvest the ingredients we use and to restore as much rainforest as possible in the process.

Any amount of funds raised by this campaign will go into expanding production capabilities of this company… No matter what the final amount raised, we are committed to growing this company because we are deeply passionate about this project and the mission. We are committed to offering our gifts in a way to contribute for a world where we can live in harmony with nature.

Staying Involved

As part of our community outreach program, we aim to offer workshops for all ages where we have fun and nourish our skin and bodies with gifts of nature… offering lessons from the natural world about our own anatomy and practical plant wisdom… with the ultimate goal for all to experience, feel, listen, and grow in understanding plants… to learn from their wisdom and find where the true beauty lies within…

Some Risks & Challenges

One occasional obstacle at Manaòs Beauty is product cost, due to our unwavering commitment to sourcing the highest quality ingredients from the Amazon and and other parts of the world. In an effort to make this business viable, buying our containers, packaging and ingredients in bulk is the best way to keep costs consistently low.

Another risk we may face is the increase in essential oil prices and seasonal availability for the ingredients we use. We have not had to deal with any setbacks related to this yet, but as we grow in sales and numbers, we perceive availability on certain rare ingredients as a possible challenge for us. However, like every smart business out there, we will come up with solutions that adapt to these challenges.

This being said… If there is a natural disaster to any region of our suppliers, we have a few backup sources where we can source ingredients. We can always pivot and get creative to tweak our formulas based on what’s available, what's in season, and what's abundant in nature during the time of production. 

We Grow with Our Customers

As we gather more customer feedback. Aychele will be able to formulate new types of botanical scents and skin care products based on consumer demand and market trends.

One of these potential products has been the idea of a specific tattoo balm… which many of our customers mentioned to us after using Bonita Cream during their tattoo recovery days. While never intending to service this niche, the feedback was overwhelmingly positive from several of our tattoed friends. Thanks guys! We can't wait to come up with something soon for you.

If you're inspired by our story and mission, please share our campaign with someone you love by e-mail, social media, or text!

Testimonials:

"These products have changed my skin and helped to connect me with the medicine of pure plant power.  After a year of using Manaòs Beauty products, I am no longer prone to weird breakouts, and have a new glow". 

- Kai A. (Brooklyn, NY)

"I love the açaí serum <Ambrosia>. Fresh, beautiful & wholesome. A definite plus for restorative daily skincare balance."

- Patricia S. (Brooklyn, NY)

"Best products I have ever used!" - Roxana I. (Montreal, Quebec)

"An angel named Aychele Hill walked into my life this weekend and  gifted one of her creations from her product line, Manaòs Beauty. In just three days, it's already completely changed my skin. It hasn't been this clear in a couple years now since I stopped using chemical prescriptions. This Ambrosia Serum is made from fruits of the Amazon by a Brazilian goddess! I have tried so many things but this is literally miraculous. LOL, I wouldn't have dreamed of taking a pic of myself in this light with no filter till now!" 

- Phoebe V. (Brooklyn, NY)

story:
WAKE UP

Did you know that self-esteem is at its lowest for pre-adolescent girls? 

In fact, American girls from low-income families often feel disconnected from their peers when it comes to these life experiences. Most girls have negative experiences when going through puberty, often feeling embarrassed, confused or scared. 

And to add more fuel to the fire, girls also find it difficult to dream and feel so constrained by gender rules that they start out with lower hopes for their careers, and are already less confident in their talents and abilities.

​

DISRUPT

Smile On Me is here to awaken every girl to her inner greatness and empower her to disrupt the status quo and change the world. We are a growing community of like-minded people who believe that maintaining a healthy mind, body, and community is key to a joyful life, and we aim to share our experience to lift up the next generation. 

We celebrate girls.

Since our 2017 launch, we've collected more than 500 feminine hygiene products, facilitated workshops focused on personal hygiene, leadership, and self-esteem, and have distributed bags filled with hygiene products to hundreds of girls in low-income communities throughout New York City!

Smile On Me: Summit is designed to build girls’ self-esteem, create a safe and welcoming space for her to feel connected with others, and promote mental and physical health and well being. Our aim is to ultimately host a day where girls can be their authentic selves and discover something new. We will gather middle school-aged girls from all five boroughs of New York City and lead them through workshops based on topics like emotional, physical, and mental health, and self-care.

SMILE

Girls with higher self-esteem, a supportive friend circle, and a safe space to be their true selves have reported having lower levels of anxiety and stress.

Contribute to our campaign today and smile on all New York City girls! Your generosity will help fund first- ever Smile On Me: Summit and help us continue to provide girls throughout the city with the essential products and educational resources needed to adequately prepare them for puberty and beyond.

All contributions to this campaign will directly fund the first ever Smile On Me: Summit from renting out a welcoming space, to providing hygiene products, impactful workshops, and, ultimately, a community for our future female leaders!

REPEAT

We’re always looking for volunteers to coordinate donation drives and develop partnerships with community-based organizations throughout New York City! Be sure to follow us on Instagram @smileonmehq and join in on the conversation. To find out more, subscribe to our e-newsletter and stay up to date with all things Smile On Me!

Want to look the part? Order your official Smile On Me t-shirt today by choosing the ‘Smile’ perk! Take a selfie rocking your tee, and share your support of Smile On Me!

Website: www.smileonme.org

Instagram: www.instagram.com/smileonmehq

Facebook: www.facebook.com/smileonmehq
story_txt: WAKE UPDid you know that self-esteem is at its lowest for pre-adolescent girls? In fact, American girls from low-income families often feel disconnected from their peers when it comes to these life experiences. Most girls have negative experiences when going through puberty, often feeling embarrassed, confused or scared. And to add more fuel to the fire, girls also find it difficult to dream and feel so constrained by gender rules that they start out with lower hopes for their careers, and are already less confident in their talents and abilities. ​DISRUPTSmile On Me is here to awaken every girl to her inner greatness and empower her to disrupt the status quo and change the world. We are a growing community of like-minded people who believe that maintaining a healthy mind, body, and community is key to a joyful life, and we aim to share our experience to lift up the next generation. We celebrate girls.Since our 2017 launch, we've collected more than 500 feminine hygiene products, facilitated workshops focused on personal hygiene, leadership, and self-esteem, and have distributed bags filled with hygiene products to hundreds of girls in low-income communities throughout New York City!Smile On Me: Summit is designed to build girls’ self-esteem, create a safe and welcoming space for her to feel connected with others, and promote mental and physical health and well being. story:
Thanks to everyone for all the generosity to date.   Beyond the funding that has come in via Indiegogo, we have also received over $1,750,000 in off-platform commitments, including $100K from PepsiCo and $1.5MM from the Jack Rudin Family Foundation.  We are already well past double our initial $1 million goal and the contributions are still coming in, enabling even more scaling of testing capacity. Thank you all for helping make this important initiative a reality.

 

To Stop the Coronavirus, We Need to Quantify It

Led by renowned pathogen discovery expert Dr. Ian Lipkin, researchers at Columbia University’s Mailman School of Public Health have developed the C3 Test, a test that can not only detect COVID-19 in people showing no symptoms, but can detect precise viral load and is therefore needed for testing treatments like blood plasma and antimalarials. 

It is a multiplex assay called the C3 Test (aka the CII COVID-19 Coronavirus Test). It is ultra-sensitive, highly accurate, quickly scalable, and delivers rapid results. Crucially, the C3 Test can accurately detect coronavirus infection even among patients exhibiting no symptoms, with results ready in four hours. 

About the C3 Test

According to the Mailman School of Public Health:

"Patients without symptoms or mild disease often have a low viral loads that may evade detection by standard tests. The C3 Test was designed and optimized to be highly sensitive, being able to detect low levels of viral RNA.

The C3 Test is similar to those seen on TV: a person provides a nasal swab for testing. The turnaround, including RNA extraction and PCR, takes less than four hours. Because Dr. Lipkin’s lab at the Center for Infection and Immunity operates outside of a clinical setting, it can deploy the test for the development of prevention and treatment strategies and not just in-hospital situations when the patients are already ill.

Importantly, this new C3 Test can decrease both false negatives and false positives, reducing not only the number of people who unknowingly spread the virus, but also reducing resources spent on quarantining or treating those who are ill due to something else.

This is crucial, because current, less sensitive tests run the risk of a negative result when in fact the patient is infected; minimizing these false negatives is essential for control of disease transmission.

Fortunately, the test is already proven to be effective and accurate. Since much of the work is coupled to testing of potential therapies and prevention strategies, it falls under the realm of research. We are not marketing the test to consumers at this point; rather, we are working with doctors and scientists to figure out how to control and treat COVID-19. Our tests align well with the White House’s current testing plans because they will help increase capacity and be able to adjust sensitivity as needed, which is important for at-risk individuals. The FDA has also cleared the assay for the proposed clinical trials."

Find more information and FAQs here: https://www.mailman.columbia.edu/public-health-...

What We Can Accomplish with Your Support:

Dr. Lipkin reports that the test has already been optimized and validated to show its sensitivity and accuracy. The C3 Test works.

With an additional $1 million in emergency funding, the laboratory could increase testing by as much as 5 times — meaning 1,000 samples daily, with results ready in four hours. This diagnostic system will be used in conjunction with therapeutic strategies to treat the infection and to monitor the effectiveness of the treatment.

However, the capacity must be increased by scaling up the laboratory workflow — we need to make more of it, and quickly. 

Your contribution to The New York Community Trust’s Mailman School of Public Health COVID-19 Research Response Fund will allow Dr. Lipkin and his team to expand C3 testing capacity and increase automation by paying for equipment, supplies, personnel, and data processing, and will also support related pandemic research at CII and the Mailman School. The C3 Test is not available as a test kit for public purchase.

The impact of your donation will be maximized, thanks to the generosity of the following partners:

  • Indiegogo, who is waiving their platform fee.

  • New York Community Trust, who is waiving fees and costs in connection with the contributions to the Fund.

The need is urgent, as both time and supplies are running out. All donations are tax deductable.

By making a donation to this campaign, you understand that your donation is ultimately going toward Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health Center for Infection and Immunity. You understand that your gift becomes the ultimate property of Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health Center for Infection and Immunity, which has ultimate control, authority, and discretion with regard to its assets.

With your help, we can fight the spread of COVID-19 and save lives.

Meet Dr. Lipkin

W. Ian Lipkin, MD is an internationally recognized expert on pathogen discovery with more than 30 years of experience in diagnostics, microbial discovery and outbreak response. He serves as the Director for Center for Infection and Immunity at Columbia University’s Mailman School of Public Health, where he is also a Professor in Epidemiology, Neurology, and Pathology & Cell Biology.

Dr. Lipkin has spent time in China during the coronavirus outbreak there, which has helped inform his understanding of this disease. Previously, Dr. Lipkin and his team implicated West Nile virus as the cause of the encephalitis epidemic in New York in 1999 and have discovered or characterized more than 500 infectious agents including Borna disease virus, West Nile virus, LuJo virus and human rhinovirus C.

The C3 test has been developed by a team that also includes Simon Williams, BS; Thomas Briese, Ph.D.; and Nischay Mishra, Ph.D.

.            

Media

  • FOX: From Spanish flu to coronavirus, lessons from world's deadliest outbreaks March 16, 2020
  • Dr. Oz: Insight into New Data Found About COVID-19 March 12, 2020
  • Dr. Oz: Are We Really Prepared for the Spread of the Coronavirus? March 6, 2020
  • Yahoo Finance: How the public can protect itself against coronavirus February 28, 2020
  • CNN: Worried about coronavirus? Hear out this doctor's message February 19, 2020
  • Time: How Travelers Around the World Are Dealing With 'Voluntary' Home Quarantines, To Help Slow Potential Coronavirus Spread February 17, 2020
  • PBS: Will COVID-19 ruin your travel plans? Follow these 3 tips March 4, 2020
  • Associated Press: Home quarantine for travelers buys time as new virus spreads February 16, 2020
  • CNBC: American doctor about to embark on new path March 20, 2020
  • CNBC: Coronavirus is more fatal in men than women, major study suggests February 18, 2020

story:
PRANA SALT CAVE and Wellness Center

My name is Liana Belanich and I am trying to bring the first dry salt therapy to Wilmington! I have UNCW Business Management degree, a 200hr Kunga Yoga and Lifestyle certification and an obsessive passion for helping others learn about health and mindfulness so that we can all live our best lives physically and emotionally. Over the years I have learned about many holistic modalities and want to share them all with you! 

Many of us suffer from physical illnesses, drug addiction, depression, anxiety, weight loss and more. For each of us the journey to health and happiness can be completely different. The transformation starts from within, learning how to love and have compassion for ourselves and others, but there are also many tools that can help us along the way. It is a life long practice of learning and making choices. Prana Salt Cave and Wellness may be able to support you where you are at on the journey by providing dry salt therapy, workshops on nutrition, breathing, compassion, and energy, classes for yoga, meditation, ecstatic dance, and movement, and events for connection and peace like kirtan and sound baths within the cave!

It is important for me to be of service to others. I have found love and peace in my own life after being in a dark place and want others to be able to do the same. Let us all come together to make this dream come to life so that we can all begin to shine a little brighter each day, to be our best selves and create a beautiful community together! 

WHAT IS DRY SALT THERAPY?

Throughout history salt has been used in many ways to optimize our health. Salt is essential for nerve and muscle function and regulating our blood PH and pressure. Dry salt therapy, also known as halotherapy, is a holistic, natural, drug free therapy used to help with respiratory issues, skin conditions, sleep, relaxation, anxiety, detoxification, physical fitness and endurance! 

In the 300sqft salt cave (room) you will be surrounded by salt on the floors, on the walls and then micro salt particles will be pumped through the air from a halogenerator. You will sit for a 45 or 20 minute session in our gravity free chairs and sit back with a blanket and eye pillow if you like, rest, or maybe even take a nap! The room will be 71degrees and at a humidity between 30-55% ensuring the best environment for your respiratory health and to maintain the negatively charged ions from the salt. This can help to neutralize the atmosphere helping to destress, ground and stabilize our mood.

What We Need 

We need to acquire more funding, be it through donation, investments or taking advantage of our awesome promotions! Be the first to be a part of Prana Salt Cave and Wellness Center!

So far I have raised $73,000 by talking to family and friends! It is time to broaden my reach and connect with all of you! We need to raise AT LEAST $67,000 more! Yes, this may sound like a lot but I know that through this campaign, events, product sales, networking and meetings with private investors I will be able to find the help we need! 

What is the funding for?

  • $84,000 for the buildout of the space, electrician, architect, contractor
  • $43,000 for the tons of Himalayan Salt and equipment
  • $13,000 for inventory, space deposit, signage, legal fees

The Impact

Prana Salt Cave will have a big impact on our community. We will provide quality services that no one else in town has yet and we will create a safe space for love, healing and connection. Not only will we help you to optimize your own well-being we will also GIVE BACK to the community!

  • We will offer FREE sessions to those in need with respiratory issues such as Cystic fibrosis and COPD 
  • We will have some donation based yoga, meditation and nutrition classes
  • We will host events for organizations 
  • AND a % of our proceeds will go to local non-profit organizations such as Yoga Village and The Cystic Fibrosis Foundation of the Carolinas

Risks & Challenges

Creating a business can be a rollercoaster! I have already faced some obstacles but continue to make moves each day! Funding is our biggest issue at the moment, I was close a few times to having all the funding but as a startup company the banks are very conservative. 

The other issue we may run into is deciding on the right space. I have two options in mind but there is the possibility that someone else could rent them before I can have enough funding to sign a lease. 

Another challenge is the amount of time it takes for permitting and building. We are hoping the process will only take 3/4 months but you just never know! Please be patient and kind to us along this journey! I will share updates and progress along the way!

Ways to Help and What you get

Free:

  • Talk to your friends and family about us
  • Share this on social media
  • Follow us on Instagram
  • Like us on Facebook
  • Offer/donate your personal services if you feel they may benefit this opportunity
  • Get excited!
  • Bring Your friends to our events
  • Send us positive, thoughts, energy, love and prayers!

Donate:

  • Gift us what you can monetarily
  • Invest in our business (serious investors please contact me personally: pranasaltcave@gmail.com)

PROMOTIONS

  • Take advantage of our awesome presales and perks!
  • Become a year or lifetime member!
  • Celebrate all the awesomeness you get at a discounted price!

Ways to Help and What you get

Free:

Talk to your friends and family about us
Share this on social media
Follow us on Instagram
Like us on Facebook
Offer/donate your personal services if you feel they may benefit this opportunity
Get excited!
Bring Your friends to our events
Send us positive, thoughts, energy, love and prayers!

Donate:

Gift us what you can monetarily
Invest in our business (serious investors please contact me personally: pranasaltcave@gmail.com)

story:
Introduction 

Wildish Botanicals is a cooperatively owned herb shop in the heart of SE Portland. We are establishing a network of natural medicine that connects local herb growers, teachers, health practitioners, herbs and supplies with the entire community to make natural medicine accessible and affordable. We aim to be a model for how local communities can work together to take their health into their own hands.

Here’s how we’ll do it:

  • Local Only. We only stock organic herbs that have been grown by local farmers. We're talking within 300 miles! This supports local economy, reduces shipping/packaging, and connects us with the nature that surrounds us.
  • Space. We’re tearing down walls (in more than one way!), to open our space for more classes and workshops. This helps teachers and health practitioners empower the community with the education we need to heal ourselves.
  • Memberships. Our Lifetime Co-op Memberships are only $100! Did we mention it’s for your entire life? This gives discounts of 15% off on bulk herbs, teas, and tinctures; as well as 20% off classes and workshops. To make our memberships accessible, a $25 deposit will start your savings instantly. We will also be giving membership scholarships to those in real need.
  • Donation-only clinics. Once a month we will be hosting donation-only clinics where people in need can receive care, regardless of economic status.
  • Charity. A percentage of select product sales goes toward local nonprofits who empower our community. For example, pet product sales support rescue shelters; and children’s health products goes toward breaking generational poverty.

 

Our Goal

Our goal for this campaign is to raise $28,500 in 30 days to build our space. The funds will go toward building community workshop tables, shelving for products, and our first purchases of locally grown herbs and botanical supplies.

We are very grateful to our open-hearted community who have been volunteering their time and labor. With their hands-on help, we will be able to do all the construction ourselves!

Our perk packages are geared toward getting our backers involved and rewarded. Selecting our membership enrollment will start your savings the day of our Grand Opening in December 2018. There will be raffle giveaways, herbal consultations, custom formulas, guided herb walks, and more!

The new wave of healthcare is using natural remedies to heal yourself and your loved ones. It’s time to reconnect with our Wildish roots and take our health back into our own hands. Your contribution will play an essential role in creating a central hub of natural medicine for our community. Every donation makes a difference, thank you for joining the Wildish movement!

 

Our Team

Paul, Daniel, Vicky, Kassaundra, and Melissa all have various backgrounds in botanical medicine. With our powers combined, we have a diverse and complementary set of skills to weave a tight web of interconnection that will benefit our entire community.

 

​More Ways To Help

  • Share our campaign
  • Check out our Instagram @wildishbotanicalspdx
  • Contact us to sell your consignment products

  • Send good vibes!
