story:
Hi! My name is Jolene and I love to Dance.


I don't dance to perform, or know the right moves, I dance because it makes me feel alive!
I do what's called conscious dance* and over the past 10 years it's been for me a life-line, a good time, a struggle, a release, therapy, a break-through and a place of gratitude. I've moved through pain and anger and joy and love, and everything in between, and gotten to feel and express it all in a safe and liberating way, and now want to share it with as many people as possible. Including you!


It's taken me a long time to find the right facilitation training - in fact it didn't exist until quite recently when one of my favorite facilitators, Brian Bergman decided to combine 20 years of yoga teaching with his Dancing Freedom facilitation experience and expert DJ skills to create the Dance Awake Facilitation training. Which I am now busy doing. I've never been as excited to do my homework in my life!


I'm raising money to pay for the tuition fees, as well as a very good sound system and DJ rig, to start offering classes as soon as possible.


One of the main reasons for crowd funding is that I want you with me on this journey!


For $5 (~R70) you get entrance into a class**. If you can't attend yourself, the money will pay the entrance for someone who wouldn't otherwise be able to afford the experience.


For $45 (~R600) you get a 1 hr one-on-one facilitation (perfect if you worry about what other people think, but want to practice getting into your body) and $60 you get a 2 hr one-on-one facilitation.


For $150 (~R2000) you get an entire class for you and your friends!** Think birthday... OR you can gift this class to a community group that wouldn't otherwise have access to this kind of opportunity.


So, if you've ever been moved by Dance, please support this project! The more you give, the more people get to move. Thank you so much!

 

 

*5 Rhythms, Movement Medicine, Dancing Freedom, Authentic Movement, Contact Improv

**Excludes travel expenses

story:
Contribute to Hip Hop is Green Today

Today we are facing an existential crisis:  global warming, overexploited natural resources, deforestation, polluted land, water and air have imperiled the sustainability of our planet.  Correspondingly, our own biology and our health and wellness are also under threat.  

A large percentage of youth are burdened by lifestyle driven chronic diseases caused by a poor diet high in processed foods:  the rates of cancer, heart attack and diabetes are at all time high levels in every state around the country. 

Our health issues are inextricably tied to our environmental issues. The same corporate food system that presents such a danger to our global ecosystem also produces food that is detrimental to our “internal ecosystems.”  In order to protect future generations we face an urgent need to heal our planet and our bodies by changing our habits and making better choices.

Hip Hop is Green (HHIG’s) call to action as a global media company is to provide messaging and live events to empower the younger generation and their families to live healthier lives and create a sustainable future.

Hip Hop Is Green merges the power of the media with the power of grassroots activism. We reach youth because we speak their language via Hip Hop culture. Millions of youth all over the world relate to Hip Hop culture as it is largest uniting force on the planet.  We broadcast the message of health and environmental responsibility into the culture of Hip Hop bringing new energy into environmental and health activism.

Over the years we have been fortunate enough to have witnessed the life changing results of our Hip Hop Green Dinner events. "If Hip Hop moves in a Green direction the World will move in a Green direction" Van Jones. If you want to know more about our organization please check out our full media kit here. 

Hip Hop is Green has changed lives all over the country assembling a team of the top plan- based Hip Hop artists, chefs, authors, naturopathic doctors, vegan brands and food companies, health speakers and organic farmers.

Then In 2015, Keith Tucker wrote a "open Letter to Hip Hop" where he outlined a new element for Hip Hop culture, the 10th Element which would be Health & Wellness. He sent this letter to many people in Hip Hop that are plant based themselves and into health & wellness,  they supported his idea and our organization then produced the 10th Element of Hip Hop Health & Wellness ceremony on April 21st, 2016, which took place in Harlem NYC, There we all signed the historic proclamation that birthed the new 10th element of Hip Hop which is Health & Wellness. 

Our organization is growing and in 2017 we started chapters of Hip Hop is Green around the nation, all our local chapters will now co-produce our events and teach the 10th Element of Hip Hop Health & Wellness program. We are now a national organization and have truly taken our organization to the next level. We are the pioneers in this new Green Age of Hip Hop. We make being healthy cool to young people, and we plan on bringing this unique and inspiring experience to communities, schools and universities and with your help as we plan on expanding our reach in 2018 and into 2019.

 

In these times when preventable illness, like childhood, type 2 diabetes, are affecting our underprivileged youth at staggering, disproportionate rates, we know your dollars will help. And, when these same children are finding it difficult to achieve in school partly due to nutritional deficits, the information and confidence they gain from our events can change the trajectory of their lives.

Our Mission:

Support holistic health and the transformation of urban communities.

We need your help to cover costs for:

We need your help today to build capacity for our organization as well as to create the necessary marketing material that will enable us to reach out to our communities. You contribution will also assist us in updating our website and hire a full time grant writer. 

Your donations helps us to...

With your help we will be able to train our team, purchase marketing material and roll out our programs in cities around the country. Our organization is growing and in 2017 we started chapters of Hip Hop is Green around the nation, all our local chapters will now co-produce our events and teach the 10th Element of Hip Hop Health & Wellness program, we are now a national organization and your contribution will help us take our organization to the next level. 

Risks

We started out eight years ago by producing 1 event a year and now we have grown into a National organization producing several events around the country. With growth like this comes many details and road blocks that we have overcame over the years. We know how to make a very small budget go far and have found the ability to deal with unknown obstacles with insightful strategy, determination, tenacity and careful planning which has lead us to our present growth. Everyday, much like many non profit organizations we have to be very creative in order to generate funds to continue our work.

CHECK OUT SOME OF OUR PERKS:

 

Other Ways You Can Help:

You can help us by sharing this with your favorite plant based business or organization as well as your friends and family.

We started out eight years ago by producing 1 event a year and now we have grown into a National organization producing several events around the country. With growth like this comes many details and road blocks that we have overcame over the years. We know how to make a very small budget go far and have found the ability to deal with unknown obstacles with insightful strategy, determination, tenacity and careful planning which has lead us to our present growth. Everyday, much like many non profit organizations we have to be very creative in order to generate funds to continue our work.


CHECK OUT SOME OF OUR PERKS:




 



Other Ways You Can Help:

You can help us by sharing this with your favorite plant based business or organization as well as your friends and family.

story:
It's amazing how many people we all know that suffer from a mental health problem in one way or another and it's not until you start talking to them about it or a situation happens that people start to open up.
 
We lost so many wonderful people in 2016, celebrities, friends and family and one had an impact that broke the silence for many people and that was our special Princess Carrie Fisher who both Wil and I had the pleasure to meet.  Even then, we didn't know she had been battling with mental health issues.  
 
FCD Events raises money for a number of amazing causes, but on Saturday night, we will be holding a party in honour of Carrie and raising money for MIND.

With the power of FCD Events and all of you, we can help remove the stigma of Mental Health Illness as well as support an amazing charity who help so many when they need it most!
 
Whether you are attending our event or not, any money you can donated will help make a difference.
 
We have over 16,000 people following us, so just £1 from everyone would be a fantastic result.
 
We want to raise as much as possible but if we hit £1,000, both WIl and I will be wearing (apparently) Star Trek Gold dresses for the night;  get to £5,000 and I will attempt to sing on stage for one song with some help of our friends (we hope).

Important
Anyone donating via a Perk, please note, donations will be made less cost's of items, i.e Autograph, photograph, action figure, etc..

Details of the event:

March 31st to April 2nd
Telford International Centre
St Quentin Gate
Telford TF3 4JH
 
Please help us to help others.
 
Thank you.
 
David Limburg & Wil Ross
FCD Events
www.fcdevents.com

Email: contactus@fcdevents.com

story:
Welcome to the Ancient Biblical Oils Crowdfunding Page! We are so happy that you have made your way here today and cannot wait to share with you our mission. We hope that you are as excited as we are about embarking on this new journey! We believe that every believer in The God of Abraham Isaac and Jacob in these modern times is challenged as to how true their faith is, is The Bible the Word of God and therefore True? We believe we have found amazing evidence that will prove The Bible to be true and will build faith and confidence in trusting in its Author and give opportunity for health and wellness to those who believe.   

So without a further ado let’s get into some of what we have discovered. We have found lots of jaw dropping secrets and we can’t share them all here but will give the opportunity to access the information via our e book. This is going to take a little bit of time but if you are passionate about Scripture it will be well worth the time spent.

''My people perish from lack of knowledge.'' Hos 6:4 

That knowledge is ancient biblical knowledge, and in that source of knowledge we find a secret, one of many secrets to be found, long hidden from us in plain sight that has now come to light - a secret to understanding ancient biblical healing!

''There is precious treasure and OIL in the dwelling of the wise.'' Pro 21:20

The wisest man to ever live wrote that text, so why does a wise man have OIL in his dwelling? Let’s find out. We find multiple witnesses in Scripture of OIL being used for spiritual purposes and for healing, we going to look at four examples of the healing aspect of OIL from The Old Testament and The New Testament.

''From the sole of the foot even to the head, there is no soundness in it, but bruises and sores and raw wounds; they are not pressed out or bound up or softened with OIL.'' Isa 1:6 

''Is there no balm (oil mixed with spices) in Gilead? Is there no physician there? Why then has the health of the daughter of my people not been restored?'' Jer 8:22 

''He went to him and bandaged his wounds, pouring on OIL and wine.'' Luk 10:34

''Is anyone among you sick? Let them call the elders of the congregation to pray over them and anoint them with OIL in the Name of The Lord.'' James 5:14

Anointing oils were used for healing and we have got to ask ourselves why is it that today so many people are turning to essential oils for health and wellness and experiencing amazing results so much so that it is speculated that the essential oils business in the USA will double in the next two years? I believe the answers can be found in Scripture!

First we must correctly define anointing OIL, contrary to popular belief anointing OIL in The Scripture is made of Olive OIL and spices and not Olive OIL alone. The spices were the ‘’medicine’’ and the Olive Oil the ‘’carrier OIL’’. Modern essential oil practice follows this example as the essential oils are the ‘’medicine’’ and 90% of the time an aroma therapist will advise you that in order to get full benefit from an essential oil or for it to be effective you must mix the essential oil into a ‘’carrier oil’’ like Olive oil.

Why is that? Could The Scripture have the answers? Yes it does! King David gives us this amazing witness, are you ready for our Creator to reveal why so many are experiencing breakthroughs with essential oil use?

We going to look at this text using ‘’Young‘s Literal Translation’’

''And he putteth on reviling as his robe, And it cometh in as water into his midst, And as oil into his bones.'' Psa 109:18 

Did you see it? King David tells us under the influence of Ruach HaKodesh (The Holy Spirit) that OIL SINKS INTO OUR BONES! Why is that amazing you ask? Well for the answer let’s turn to modern science, here  is a hint, the answer lays in the function of our bones.

Science tell us that our bones produce our BLOOD and IMMUNE SYSTEM!

Dr. Brad J. Spellberg, MD , Infectious Disease, answered

The bone marrow is the site of production of all blood cells, including white blood cells. White blood cells are what defend our bodies from infections. So, if the bone marrow does not work right, and white cells are not produced in adequate numbers or with normal function, the body becomes at risk for infection. https://www.sharecare.com/health/immune-lymphat...

 

 

What does this mean? Well according to the Bible, Biblical medicines which were aromatics, as are essential oils, were mixed into a ‘’carrier oil’’ and the physical healing properties of these aromatics was carried by the carrier oil to the very epicenter of the users blood and immune production system giving their bones the necessary building blocks to produce a strong immune system which in turn would causes healing.

Sorry but right now I must add a big HaleluYah!

It’s amazing that the essential oils industry named these base oils ‘’carrier oils’’ and this name that was chosen by people who don’t know this Biblical information we are sharing with you today perfectly matches the function of oil as per King David’s 3000 year old testimony, as the ‘’carrier oil’’ carries or transports the aromatic additive in it to the bones!

Let’s take a look at King David’s 3000 year old witness from another angle not only does this text gives us the revelation of the importance of anointing your body with oil He also gives us the revelation of the importance of bathing in salts and spices. We going to look at the English Standard Version of the text.

''He clothed himself with cursing as his coat; may it soak into his body like water, like oil into his bones!'' Psa 109:18 

HaleluYah!

From this truly amazing Biblical text we understand that water soaks into our bodies and therefore water that has spices or salts in it sinks into our bodies as well and would carry the healing properties of those spices and salts into their bodies and they would experience their healing effects. It doesn’t stop there while enjoying this bath the fragrance of the spices would also give its ancient user a simultaneous aromatherapy treatment!

''…a threefold cord is not quickly broken.'' Ecc 4:12 

According to the evidence we see in The Bible this is the threefold cord to Ancient Biblical Health and Wellness!

Anointing oils

Bath Soaks

Food

These three aspects where the Health, Healing, Wellness and Healing equivalent to the battleflied warriors, sword, helmet and shield, essential elements for victory on the war on sickness illness and disease.

Our Creator gave mankind anointing oils and spices for medicine and 3000 years ago through King David left us this Bible text so that we could understand this process and today we sharing this with you and we have proof that this is true because in the last 20 years hundreds of thousands of people who do not know this information have turned to essential oils for health and wellness and are confirming and experiencing Biblical health and Wellness without knowing it, and that number is growing rapidly every day!

This is the tip of the ice burg of information YHVH (The LORD) has revealed to us over the past few months, if this peaked your interest then please partner with us and download a copy of our e-book where we reveal even more amazing Biblical insights on the subject of Biblical Health and Wellness.

For example.

Which carrier oil do we believe to be most effective.

In essential oil circles Frankincense is being hailed as a ‘’cure all miracle oil’’ why is this so? What if we told you that over 4000 years ago our Creator revealed this fact to us through the writings of Moses in a way that will knock your socks off!

What does the Bible says about meditation, incense/aromatherapy? The Bible not only gives us evidence of these being used it also reveals the secret key to how meditation, incense/aromatherapy and breathing work! 

Out of all the creation mankind is the only creature obsessed with how we smell! Is this just a random characteristic? No, our obsession with smell stems from the first sin and is linked to our redemption!

Salvation, Isaiah 53 and the Frankincense tree!

YHVH’s (The LORD’s) appointed times, His calendar and times of prayer.

 

 

We are a company with a passion to build believers faith by bringing The Creator and His Words out of the abstract thought realm into the tangible, actionable real world by providing the critical information to reinforce belief and the products needed to experience natural Biblical health and wellness.   

 

 

The are also tons of benefits we have seen when people start using our product, these are just some of them.  And we cannot wait to see what you will have to add to this list:

  • Spiritual Wellness
  • Physical Wellness
  • Emotional Wellness
  • Covenant Intimacy Restoration

 

“There is a strong appeal in connecting with our ancient past, and that connection can be a major draw into the world of remedies.” Knowing that countless generations have turned to the same wellness properties is comforting, and even more so when we can connect it to Biblical times and “prescriptions,” for lack of a better term. WE believe when the Author of Life writes a prescription, you take it! The bottom line for us is that Elohim (God) gave us these oils for our use and benefit – as Elohim’s (God’s) Medicine.

The goal of this campaign is to reach like-minded people for collaboration, to raise money in exchange for early access and rewards, and we believe this campaign is the perfect vehicle to spread the word. We truly believe that the restoration of this lost aspect of ancient Biblical life will bring all of us one step closer in our efforts to reconnect with our Creator. This campaign will give you the basics on our efforts and progress with regards to our epic endeavor. Beyond that we encourage you to ask us questions, donate and get involved. We developed Ancient Biblical Oils for your benefit, so enjoy! We believe we are really onto the original way to health and wellness without all the chemicals and artificial components.

 

 

We feel we are uniquely qualified to take on this endeavor because of the following:

  • Our team’s unique insights into the mechanics of healing via The Biblical text.
  • Our understanding of the role of aromatics in the relationship between YHVH (The LORD) and His ''Bride.''
  • Our team’s vision: to supply believers with health and wellness oils on every continent.
  • Our unique idea and plan for execution.
  • Our passion for truth and natural Biblical health and wellness, people need to know what is out there.
  • Our superior quality organic and wildcrafted oils.
  • And of course, You

 

 

 

Our company is passionate about creating an unmatched solution that’s going to change people’s lives! Our company will run our business based on our mission statement of providing believers with groundbreaking, faith building Biblical insights and top quality oils on every continent. So far all of our feedback has been over the top, everyone is enjoying the many useful benefits of Ancient Biblical Oils.

Together with our team we take our passion for others well-being beyond just this one idea and we put it into every decision we make, changing people’s lives has always driven us at every stage.

 

 

 

 

The Ancient Biblical Oils needs your financial assistance but above all it needs your attention and interest to share this information and produce and launch these products. If you believe in our vision of bringing Biblical health and wellness to the nations and there by preparing ''the Bride'' to meet Her King. Then now is the time to join with us please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Instagram) and share this campaign with someone you love. Help us spread the word and get things started!

We also have some really awesome perks, everything from our e-book containing all our truly profound, hidden in plain sight, Biblical Secrets regarding Ancient Biblical Healing, to our launch limited edition ‘’Genesis’’ range of organic and wildcrafted oils.  

For our International friends if you would like to purchase any of the physical products please contact us so we can arrange the shipping costs. 

Don’t need anything?

It’s OK we understand! There are people that just want to help this vision come to life, and we thank you, we need you too!

If you are a local business, our facility is a blank canvas and we are looking for trusted sponsors to join our team. Anyone who is enthusiastic about Ancient Biblical Oils could be a great fit. Do not hesitate to reach out to us for more information.

Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our vision. It will assist us with the cost of further development of our product and business model, manufacturing, production and training. We are committed to continuous improvement to ensure we are always giving people the best possible solutions.

We will be using the funding to:

  • Further develop our product and business model.
  • Further develop our manufacturing capabilities.
  • Further develop our teams effectiveness via education and training.   
  • Create additional products and services that will make Ancient Biblical Health and Wellness a modern reality that is accessible to every believer globally.

We need about $10 000 in order to break Ancient Biblical Oils into the market in the United States. That will include marketing, materials, labor and related expenses for start-up.

Other Ways to Help

If you aren't able to make a monetary donation, but would like to contribute to the campaign mission, there are plenty of other ways to help.

Teach someone else about the need for change and share our project with those you love.

Spread the word

You can contribute your popularity by telling your friends and family about this campaign. The success of this campaign is directly correlated with the number of people who view this page. If you can increase that number, you are making a tangible contribution to the mission.

 

 

We have taken the time to get nearly everything in place before launching this campaign. We took the risk up front by delaying the launch of this campaign until we believed it was ready, to lessen the risk to our backers. We have a great team in place so we don't predict many obstacles here. But there is always the unknown, we will face every obstacle with the same tenacity and perseverance that we have from the start.

 

 

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word. We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters. Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed. We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve. You are all part of our Ancient Biblical Oils family.

 

 

For those of us who don't like making donations over the Internet, please feel free to contact me via email: daniel@ancientbiblicaloils.com and I will provide you with a mailing address to send check or money order to. I will post your contribution on the campaign with your name and I will deliver whatever perk you would like.

 

If you wish to contact us:

 

Website: www.ancientbiblicaloils.com

 

Our Social Media Connections:

  • Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ancientbiblicaloils/
  • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Ancient-Biblical-Oils-... 
  • YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtmF_ZnH229WO8...

 

Contact Information

Name: Daniel Hall

Phone Number: +27842020377

E Mail: daniel@ancientbiblicaloils.com 

 

If you have thoughts or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact us at daniel@ancientbiblicaloils.com

Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed. We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve. You are all part of our Ancient Biblical Oils family.  For those of us who don't like making donations over the Internet, please feel free to contact me via email: daniel@ancientbiblicaloils.com and I will provide you with a mailing address to send check or money order to. I will post your contribution on the campaign with your name and I will deliver whatever perk you would like. If you wish to contact us: Website: www.ancientbiblicaloils.com Our Social Media Connections:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ancientbiblicaloils/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Ancient-Biblical-Oils-... 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtmF_ZnH229WO8...

 Contact InformationName: Daniel HallPhone Number: +27842020377E Mail: daniel@ancientbiblicaloils.com  If you have thoughts or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact us at daniel@ancientbiblicaloils.com

story:
The Reason

Hi my name is Beau, i am 29 years old, a fiance, a father, and a home owner.

Lately i have noticed that the world is a little disconnected.

We live in our phones and don' t interact anymore.

So for anyone who is going out to a club and see's someone that they want to talk to but doesn' t know what to say, hand them a 'Free Hug Card'.

For anyone who is coming home after a long day at work and just wants their partner to hold them but doesn't want to ask, hand them a 'Free Hug Card'.

For anyone that walks past someone having a bad day and you want to help, hand them a 'Free Hug Card'.

The best thing about a hug is they are free and transferable, but to give one without some sort of indication would be strange. 

So please, donate :).

 

The How

I' m not just guessing here I do have some Photoshop skills and a basic understanding of the printing industry as i did work for a graphics design business for 2 years.

The cards will be high quality, at least 310 gsm, matt, full color both sides.

The reason for the $1000 target is to be able to get enough people interested so i can start distributing small packets of 10 'Free Hug' cards to as many people as possible and to get them to fill in a testimony form to show how the cards helped them or better yet how they helped somebody else.

My main goal is to get enough interest to open a website that people can place orders with and actually distribute for a much longer time.

 

The Why

The reason why i thought the hug cards would be a good idea is because it gets people interacting again, at worst it gives someone a laugh because of the corniness, at best it gives someone a shoulder to cry on knowing that someone cares.

 

The Way

My brother still runs the graphics design / printing business that i worked at, so being able to access a printer and getting the cards made isn't the hard part for me.

The hard part is you, i need you.

Having the cards available for sale doesn't get sales, i need people that want to go out and talk with a stranger, that want to help someone in need, or someone that just wants a hug, i need all of you to get involved, get the cards out there for other people to get interested.

If you are needing a Hug, someone looks like they need a Hug, or there is a special someone you want to Hug. Hand them a #Freehugcard.

 

The Second Option

For those of you who love the idea but dont have the funds please spread the word.

#thehugcard - Get it trending.

Facebook - Start Following. (https://www.facebook.com/freehugcard/)

Instagram - Tag a photo of someone hugging.

Indiegogo - Share the link.

 

Thank you.

story:
Hi everyone, 

I am very excited to have you here! The pure fact that you are reading this means you care about mental health and raising mental health awareness.

STORY

My name is Katalin Axmann. I have been working as a Certified Yoga Therapist in mental health hospitals since 2009. Through these years I have developed a highly effective program of powerful yoga therapy techniques to improve mental health.  My program has helped not only adults but also teens, as well as seniors suffering from depression, anxiety, trauma, suicidal thoughts, alcoholism, and drug abuse. 

Unfortunately, I do not have to visit the hospitals to see people struggling with mental issues. In a stress-fueled world, we ourselves experience high levels of stress, anxiety, and fried nerves daily basis.  We reach for quick fixes like coffee, alcohol, prescription medications, and drugs which all weaken our nervous system and contribute to the problem. Hence, we often forget what true health and happiness feel like. 

I do believe that mental health is just as important as physical health. I envision a very healthy community where people are not only physically healthy but also mentally well. This vision inspired me to create a comprehensive workbook containing all my knowledge of yoga therapy techniques to improve mental health. Over the years, these techniques helped countless people experience less loneliness and depression and live with more fulfillment and happiness. Now, with your support, I hope to help many more people live a life of happiness.

YOUR HELP NEEDED

I have completed my comprehensive yoga therapy workbook and I now need funding for

  • production costs,
  • design,
  • and distribution.

I am very proud of this workbook and the value it offers to the community. I can't wait to offer it to the many people who are not able to thrive due to their mental health.

If mental health and a healthy community are important to you, I would like for you to check out my perks and see which one of them resonates with you. Your support is wide-reaching and you or your loved one will benefit by pre-ordering. You will also broaden the scope of my project to include more health care facilities, retirement communities, and rehabilitation practices as well as to train teachers in this methodology.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Even if you are unable to back the project, sharing it on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram is hugely appreciated. (There are sharing buttons on the page!)

IN LOVE & LIGHT

Katalin Axmann, Founder of Kat's Yoga Lab, RYT200, YACEP, IRYT

story:
The world is wasting tons of food good for consumption, despite having 795M hungry people all over the world

We have asked some of them to share their stories, and this was what happened.

（Permission received for filming and sharing ）

Even in a country as developed as Canada, we are still faced with this problem over the past decade. We want to use technology to solve this situation.



The IMPACT we could make

With you, we can do more.
 

We want to put fridges on the streets, so the communities can share

FUUDY is a non-profit organization that aims to use technologically advanced fridges combined with social network to redistribute surplus food to people in need.

Giving back to the community should be easy and enjoyable. Beyond SmartSharing Fridges on the streets, we will build a network that allows individuals, restaurants, and corporations to share food within minutes. 

You can drop off the food by yourself, or let others do it for you through our rewards program. 


 

To help more people with fewer volunteers,
We make the fridge smart

FUUDY’s SmartSharing Fridge automates operations such as user registration and identification, real-time fill-up rate track, and data solution.

To help us ensure food safety, simply register online or through your smartphone with your social media accounts before using the fridge. Alternatively, you can also register in person at the fridge using the facial recognition system.

When using the fridge, you can unlock it with your phone or face, and enter information about the food you share on the fridge’s screen. Your online sharing profile will analyze your monthly food recovered, and help you lower food waste.

 

See your impacts within minutes

Let’s say you found some surplus food in the fridge at 8 pm before flying for your vacation on the second day. Here is what would happen.

 


This would not happen without YOU

We have already finished the stages of proof of concept and validation testing before going on Indiegogo. We are now part of the Indiegogo x Arrow incubation program, working with technical experts from Arrow and IBM to build the alpha prototype.

Given the cost and complexity of this project, we decided to use this campaign to raise $50,000 for our next milestone of alpha prototype and our first pilot fridge. Additional funds we receive will go toward future milestones and our stretch goals.

If we have 200 people to support and donate, for the average price of a cup of coffee a week, we can help 36,500 people in need!


 

Join FUUDY's Movement Against Hunger!

In 2018, we will launch our pilot fridge in downtown Toronto. The pilot will help us decide the best model to scale up across cities and countries.

 

The pilot fridge will redistribute food at the level of smartness determined by our campaign results. In other words, it is determined by you!

 

Support Us On Indiegogo

We have built FUUDY to a proof of concept and what you see today. Now, we are one step away from bringing this to the street, and we need your support to make this happen.

Your support decides how many people we could help, and you will always be part of this, as your names, words, voice and even video will be on the 1st SmartSharing Fridge!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Become our schools, organizations, and corporate partners, discuss with us how we can work together.
  • Share this page, spread the word about #FUUDY on Facebook or Twitter.
  • Join our volunteer team, share your knowledge and skills to save food and people.
  • ​​​Stay connected. Follow FUUDY on Facebook and on Twitter to give us your suggestions and stay up-to-date on FUUDY's news
     

(Photos credit to Weiwei)

 

Support our project, share our page, join the movement. Let's solve hunger with technology!

 

 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Stretch Goals

 

About Us

The FUUDY Team

We are a group of students and young professionals who want to use technology and creativity to improve existing solutions to hunger and food waste problems. Our team also include volunteers from 12 universities and across industries.

 

Roadmap



FAQ

Why high-tech in a fridge? Isn’t it more expensive than traditional methods?

If there is a problem which hasn’t been solved for the past decades, technology is likely to be the solution.

Whether it is the perishable food redistribution in a short amount of time, or the safety control of the fridge access, this cannot be possible without technology.

While tackling the same problem as we do, traditional methods involve high operational costs such as transportation and storage. Most of the resources are spent on the maintenance of the current operation, with a small portion left for improving the solution itself.

FUUDY will build a model that is scalable. It operates with low-cost given the automation, and can be self-sustainable with additional revenue streams such as advertisements.

 

How will you ensure food safety?

The criteria of shared food is: if you wouldn’t eat it, don’t put it in the fridge. For safety reasons, the fridge will not accept raw fish, eggs, meat, open canned and dried goods. For prepared food, we also ask sharers to use labels provided at the fridge to label the date it was made, and to the best of your knowledge, whether it contained or have been contacted with food allergens as set by Health Canada as priority allergens.

The user registration and identification process prevent inappropriate use of the fridge. While we didn’t find any food poisoning cases reported among existing community fridges across the world in history, we will monitor and address the first signs of inappropriate use.

Our volunteers will inspect the food regularly. Once the app is launched, extra points will be provided to donors and food savers (people who bring other’s food to the fridge) for food inspection while using the fridge. We are also looking into automatic food inspection technologies that could be installed in the fridge, feel free to contact us if you want to discuss more.

 

Where will you place the fridges?

We are seeking approval from the government for placing our first fridge on the street at downtown Toronto. We also have some communities and restaurant partners expressing their interest in hosting a fridge.

 

What if the campaign does not meet the goals or stretch goals? Would you still continue the development?

As our campaign goal is flexible, your contribution will go toward the development of FUUDY after the campaign finishes. Even if the original goal is not met, we will still deliver our tote bags and virtual perks. For perks related to the first fridge, we would keep you updated and try our best to delivery in 2018.


Will this initiative go beyond Toronto and Canada?

Yes. We currently have partners in the UK and China. If we make it happen, FUUDY will be likely to go to these countries in the near future. We are excited to expand FUUDY’s partner network in Canada and other countries to fight against world hunger and food waste.

 

If the fridge comes offline- will I be held liable for the food I share?

NOPE! Canada's Donation of Food Act passed in 1994 protects donors from liabilities for any damages caused by the consumption of the food shared. Sadly, not many people know about it.

When integrated smart lock to the fridge, we will also put a disclaimer on the fridge to legally exempt donors from any responsibility, including negligence. Users will need to accept the disclaimer before using the fridge.

 

Would sharing surplus food encourage more waste?

Absolutely no! We aim to tackle the fundamental cause of food waste issues, but it will be a long process. While waste can not be eliminated overnight, sharing edible surplus food feeds millions of hungry people and raise the public awareness of food waste. As people share more, they will change the food waste habit. The hunger and food recovery data will also help institutions to further solve this problem.

 

Are you a non-profit?

Yes, FUUDY is a initiated project under The Futurists, a registered federal non-profit organization in Canada, and a verified non-profit on Google and Indiegogo.

 

Can I use Indiegogo’s email receipt for tax-deduction purpose?

Unfortunately, Indiegogo’s nonprofit program does not apply to Canadian nonprofits, so the email receipt for your contribution cannot be used for a tax deduction purpose. Please contact info@fuudy.org for more information.

 

Can I donate from outside Canada?

Absolutely! Indiegogo only accepts international credit cards, not bank or debit cards. Unfortunately, we can’t accept PayPal, so the way to donate internationally is with a credit card.

 

What payment methods do you accept?

Indiegogo accepts all major credit cards.


I have more questions. Who could I turn to?

Please contact info@fuudy.org to ask your question. We are more than happy to get back to you as soon as we can.


Thank You, our partners and supporters!

We wouldn't have been this far without you.

story:
Imagine something that can help you, help your loved ones, and help thousands of people worldwide, all at the same time! This is NOT just wishful thinking. This is the real thing: An easy to follow healthy lifestyle plan that can help delay onset, slow down decline, and greatly increase quality of life for those with dementia, and all who care for them.

What makes this program so effective is that it builds on three of the most proven, successful, respected dementia mitigation/prevention programs out there, and adds a number of additional components that make it even more effective. Then it weaves it all together into a comprehensive lifestyle plan that is actually practical and affordable.

  • My name is Del. For 38 years now I have been a health and wellness professional. Over the years my clients have included athletes, well known personalities within the entertainment industry, business professionals, and seniors. For the first time anywhere I am bringing the power of an integrative healthy lifestyle upgrade to the world of aging and specifically to the reduction and mitigation of Alzheimer's disease and related dementia. This is the missing link that we have all been waiting for!
  • This campaign will make it possible for me to finish writing, editing, publishing, and distributing the "Memory-Care Action Plan" book and website. By doing so, this breakthrough approach can help thousands of others.
  • By contributing to this project you are helping to slow down and mitigate the devastating impact of dementia, thus improving the lives of countless seniors and their families.

What We Need & What You Get:

 

  • This project needs $15,000. immediate support to be able to continue. This funding will help pay for expenses incurred in developing the program, writing, and publishing the book.
  • If it reaches its campaign goal the incoming funds will go to: Direct editing, printing, publication, distribution costs which are estimated at $7900. Additional research, writing, program development costs, and support costs which are estimated to be about $6800. - $7200. Production of all perks and shipping (when applicable) is included within this budget. This will also go to additional training so that I can help even more people.
  • In return for your contribution, you will get early access to the e-book and eventually the hard copy of the book (with the larger contributions).
  • If we do not reach our total goal, the funds will still help pay for the production of the book. Even if only 65% of funds are raised we can still go forward with the book.
  • If we do not receive enough funding to publish and distribute the book then some perks WILL change. A one hour consulting/coaching session will be substituted for the hard-copy book. (Which is actually greater monetary value than the book anyway)
  • If we do not reach the critical minimum of our goal then there will be no published e-book. This perk will also change.  Most of the material will be made available to you on a chapter by chapter basis that will be exclusively available to you online. Regardless, you WILL get something worthwhile.
  • If we exceed out goal, well . . . we can build a connected, interactive, subscription based website as well that can become the one-stop, go-to site for the latest advances in dementia mitigation and prevention.  And a whole lot more. Imagine that!

The Impact

Alzheimer's disease is on its way to directly affecting some 45 million people globally. The costs are approaching one trillion dollars. It is getting worse, not better. The numbers are growing, not declining. Conventional approaches are failing. Only this kind of integrative, multi-faceted approach (combined with prudent use of select medications) will succeed. No matter what medical breakthroughs happen in the future, it will still be necessary to support them with this integrative approach. This IS the way of the future. By contributing to this, you will be a part of the leading edge that will finally lead to the end of Alzheimer's disease and many related dementia.

This approach can make a massive difference.

I have successfully run integrative wellness programs before. And not just anywhere. I have run these programs in world-class destinations such as Aspen, Colorado, The San Francisco Bay Area, Vancouver, B.C. Whistler B.C., and more. The programs I have developed in the past have been highly effective. I am connected to some of the greatest minds and pioneers in this field, globally. This project in particular is the most researched and carefully developed program I have been involved with. It already is working, with tremendous results. It can work for you. It can work for your loved ones. It can help everyone.

Risks & Challenges

I have financed this entire project with my own resources. These are running out. Without an infusion of funds, the whole project could be in jeopardy. Without funding it cannot move any further forward. The longer this process takes the higher the probability that someone else somewhere might come up with a similar approach, and beat me to the punch. While it is unlikely that anyone will come up with a program as effective and complete, it is possible that a lower quality approach can be marketed aggressively and take market share before my book gets out into the marketplace. There could be some minor push-back from those who have a vested interest in the status-quo.

  • I have learned to stretch a dollar. Over the years I have proved that with even meager resources I can achieve success.
  • I handle push-back and skepticism with positive results and sound science.
  • The greatest risk is not getting enough funding to successfully complete this project. Measures have been taken to still provide value to all contributors so that the educational material can still be available via coaching, consulting, and online.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you do not have the financial means to help this project and my work then you can still help: You can get the word out and make some noise about this campaign. Please pass this along to all your friends, colleagues, associates, and anyone else who you think might have an interest in this.
  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools!   Spread the word. Let's get this going now!
story_txt:
Imagine something that can help you, help your loved ones, and help thousands of people worldwide, all at the same time! This is NOT just wishful thinking. This is the real thing: An easy to follow healthy lifestyle plan that can help delay onset, slow down decline, and greatly increase quality of life for those with dementia, and all who care for them.
What makes this program so effective is that it builds on three of the most proven, successful, respected dementia mitigation/prevention programs out there, and adds a number of additional components that make it even more effective. Then it weaves it all together into a comprehensive lifestyle plan that is actually practical and affordable.

My name is Del. For 38 years now I have been a health and wellness professional. Over the years my clients have included athletes, well known personalities within the entertainment industry, business professionals, and seniors. For the first time anywhere I am bringing the power of an integrative healthy lifestyle upgrade to the world of aging and specifically to the reduction and mitigation of Alzheimer's disease and related dementia. This is the missing link that we have all been waiting for!
This campaign will make it possible for me to finish writing, editing, publishing, and distributing the "Memory-Care Action Plan" book and website. By doing so, this breakthrough approach can help thousands of others.
By contributing to this project you are helping to slow down and mitigate the devastating impact of dementia, thus improving the lives of countless seniors and their families.


What We Need & What You Get:
 

This project needs $15,000. immediate support to be able to continue. This funding will help pay for expenses incurred in developing the program, writing, and publishing the book.
If it reaches its campaign goal the incoming funds will go to: Direct editing, printing, publication, distribution costs which are estimated at $7900. Additional research, writing, program development costs, and support costs which are estimated to be about $6800. - $7200. Production of all perks and shipping (when applicable) is included within this budget. This will also go to additional training so that I can help even more people.
In return for your contribution, you will get early access to the e-book and eventually the hard copy of the book (with the larger contributions).
If we do not reach our total goal, the funds will still help pay for the production of the book. Even if only 65% of funds are raised we can still go forward with the book.
If we do not receive enough funding to publish and distribute the book then some perks WILL change. A one hour consulting/coaching session will be substituted for the hard-copy book. (Which is actually greater monetary value than the book anyway)
If we do not reach the critical minimum of our goal then there will be no published e-book. This perk will also change.  Most of the material will be made available to you on a chapter by chapter basis that will be exclusively available to you online. Regardless, you WILL get something worthwhile.
If we exceed out goal, well . . . we can build a connected, interactive, subscription based website as well that can become the one-stop, go-to site for the latest advances in dementia mitigation and prevention.  And a whole lot more. Imagine that!


The Impact
Alzheimer's disease is on its way to directly affecting some 45 million people globally. The costs are approaching one trillion dollars. It is getting worse, not better. The numbers are growing, not declining. Conventional approaches are failing. Only this kind of integrative, multi-faceted approach (combined with prudent use of select medications) will succeed. No matter what medical breakthroughs happen in the future, it will still be necessary to support them with this integrative approach. This IS the way of the future. By contributing to this, you will be a part of the leading edge that will finally lead to the end of Alzheimer's disease and many related dementia.
This approach can make a massive difference.
I have successfully run integrative wellness programs before. And not just anywhere. I have run these programs in world-class destinations such as Aspen, Colorado, The San Francisco Bay Area, Vancouver, B.C. Whistler B.C., and more. The programs I have developed in the past have been highly effective. I am connected to some of the greatest minds and pioneers in this field, globally. This project in particular is the most researched and carefully developed program I have been involved with. It already is working, with tremendous results. It can work for you. It can work for your loved ones. It can help everyone.

Risks & Challenges
I have financed this entire project with my own resources. These are running out. Without an infusion of funds, the whole project could be in jeopardy. Without funding it cannot move any further forward. The longer this process takes the higher the probability that someone else somewhere might come up with a similar approach, and beat me to the punch. While it is unlikely that anyone will come up with a program as effective and complete, it is possible that a lower quality approach can be marketed aggressively and take market share before my book gets out into the marketplace. There could be some minor push-back from those who have a vested interest in the status-quo.

I have learned to stretch a dollar. Over the years I have proved that with even meager resources I can achieve success.
I handle push-back and skepticism with positive results and sound science.
The greatest risk is not getting enough funding to successfully complete this project. Measures have been taken to still provide value to all contributors so that the educational material can still be available via coaching, consulting, and online.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you do not have the financial means to help this project and my work then you can still help: You can get the word out and make some noise about this campaign. Please pass this along to all your friends, colleagues, associates, and anyone else who you think might have an interest in this.
You can use the Indiegogo share tools!   Spread the word. Let's get this going now!
